author: {'steamid': '76561198293909829', 'num_games_owned': 7682, 'num_reviews': 461, 'playtime_forever': 1700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1373, 'playtime_at_review': 1700, 'last_played': 1711371139}
review:
[b]Carmageddon Max Pack[/b] offers a nostalgic trip back to the chaotic and over-the-top world of vehicular mayhem. While the visuals may be outdated by today's standards, the gameplay remains as fun and exhilarating as ever. 

With its unique blend of racing, destruction, and dark humour, Carmageddon Max Pack provides hours of entertainment for those looking to unleash their inner daredevil. If you can overlook the dated graphics, this classic title is a wild ride that is sure to bring back fond memories of the golden age of arcade racing games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967449126', 'num_games_owned': 2389, 'num_reviews': 366, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1708918996}
review:
I loved Camageddon when I was a kid and this came out but I can't recommend this version today. The insanity of running over pedestrians is still there but beyond the nostalgia this isn't a particularly good version.

First, the game opens in DOSBox and it's in something like 320p. You have to open a config file outside of the game to raise the resolution. Fine, whatever. I can get past that as a one time set up. You alt-tab once? Too bad, black screen until you close the game and boot it back up. The music is great, when the audio plays. I don't know what seems to trigger for all the audio to cut off but it randomly does and it will not go back on until you guessed it, shut the game down and relaunch it. Steam says I played the game for 40 minutes. Of that time, my sound completely shut off 4 times and I had to restart the game 3 times because everything went black from alt-tabbing.

Oh, and when everything does decide to work, you can't rebind half the controls! There's no native controller support. The default keys are the number pad 8, 4, 6, 2. I don't get why 2 is brake/reverse instead of 5 which would feel at least semi natural. You can only seem to rebind half the keys, you can't use WASD to drive. 

The physics are obviously going to be terrible by today's standards. I'm probably looking at it through nostalgia glasses and maybe it was this bad back in the day but it just feels awful to drive in this game today. You have to slow down way too much to make any turn. While turning with any kind of speed, you will never be lucky enough to find that threshold between barely turning at all or completely spinning out into a full 360. 

I don't know if it's this particular version of Camageddon or if it's the game itself. But after the novelty of running over pedestrians or cows to add time to the clock, when you're lucky enough to not have to shut the game down due to bugs, you're still left with a frustrating driving experience. It's a real shame to not recommend Carmageddon because it is such a classic to me but this just really isn't worth it unless they at least patch the bugs. Judging that it's almost a 30 year old game, I just know that's never going to happen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340995985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1709418864}

author: {'steamid': '76561198192567673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2917, 'last_played': 1707179163}
review:
Joguei bastante na época do lançamento, quando ainda era adolescente e agora foi legal revisitar a franquia.

Achei um pouco fácil demais chegar ao final, mesmo na dificuldade mais alta e uma vez terminado, há poucos motivos para jogar novamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561199152101190', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1668154818}
review:
This game is very special on a personal level. it was the first game I've ever played as a kid in the late 90s and it defined not only my love for video games but also got me into metal since then. I can't even recall how many times I replayed it since then and I still have a lot of fun every time. 

It's bloody, explosive, badass. Simple and to the point, and it achieves its purpose very well. The characters and vehicles are badass and the tracks are fun. It's the kind of straightforward unhinged fun that we don't find very often nowadays.

Together with Twisted Metal and Vigilante 8 it completes what I call the holy trinity of my childhood's racing games and I will probably replay it from time to time for years to come still!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021434924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1697203612}
review:
The mobile version is far better than this outdated garbage.
No source ports. Tried modernizing the game with a so called special edition you simply drag and drop and play. it won't run though. Drag and drop and it should run. Right?
Apparently not!!
Too bad the mobile version lacks the splat pack. What a shame. If video game preservation is so important then this game deserves to be modernized on PC as well with all the modifications they did with the mobile version.
But it wouldn't be a problem if stupid dosbox didn't use the s key as a mute function.
All I know is that I'd rather overall play the mobile version even though it lacks the splat pack.  I can't believe there has to be a catch on both ends for on one hand playing the mobile version is cleaner and more optimized but on the other you have the PC version where it's the only way to play the splat pack. Why Stainless didn't the splat pack ever get put out on mobile? Would it have been redundant? The levels are undoubtedly more imaginative and plainly different than the base game so basically brushing off the expansion is a disservice to this classic game.
And it is sad how under the radar this game feels. Like seriously before GTAIII you had this. THIS! The first two GTA's hold no candle to this classic that showed you a glimpse into what GTAIII would become. The fact that you could mow down swathes of pedestrians in a 3D game in 1997 should have blown minds. Must have had bad marketing because this game should still be soaring.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168758718', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 716, 'last_played': 1705773495}
review:
I am super pissed. Love the game, but cannot accept the fact that this 26 year old game which I ran perfectly fine back in the day on a 166MHz 16MB machine now is barely playable on a six-core 3.9 GHz 16 gb RAM with a 4gb graphics card machine. I installed the fan-made restoration pack however still is not right and even it was - that is a fan-made patch and has nothing to do with Steam (and GOG for that matter) releasing a half-assed version and charging for it. Can't get over the fact there is a free Android port that works flawlessly at 60 fps on a phone but we cannot get a commercial version running on a modern PC "out of the box". Pathetic. Works OK with dgvoodoo's wrapper but that's not the point.

Another edit: the 12 hours spent according to this review is 12 hours spent in trying to make this release work. Nothing more to add.

author: {'steamid': '76561199198049191', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1673302141}
review:
Muy bueno en general, con unas mecánicas "revolucionarias" para la época, por decirlo de alguna manera, siendo además el primer juego lanzado en Steam, aunque al ser un juego antiguo, emulándose en MS-DOS, erra bastante al no ser muy compatible con sistemas operativos modernos como Windows 10, teniendo bastantes problemas e incomodidades con aspectos como los controles del mismo, sin ser muy comodos que digamos.
Aún así le doy un 8/10, esperando que en algún momento lancen un remaster o algo así del mismo, realmente se lo merece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096071887', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2011, 'last_played': 1696206779}

author: {'steamid': '76561197989766649', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1621516214}
review:
You drive around in a car and do laps, hit other cars, run over pedestrians or a combination of all three.. It boils down to a high octane mixture of WWE and Mad Max with an added dose of the 90s “edgy” tastelessness. Carmageddon is truly a child of its time and therein lies part of its problems. It is more or less a hassle to optimize on modern rigs, Dosbox works somewhat but honestly I have had a plethora of performance issues so your mileage may vary, alot.. The gameplay in itself is fine for what it is but the plethora of crashes and bugs is honestly the main thing that keeps me from returning.

Be warned. Only get it if you love fixing broken things, be it cars or games..

author: {'steamid': '76561198414038144', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1710455367}
review:
Carmageddon,un nome che potrebbe invogliare gli arabi a ribombardare gli Stati Uniti con un Boeing 747 e un caccia alieno,ma è il nome di uno dei giochi probabilmente più violenti mai creati nella storia.
Partiamo dal fatto che non abbia una storia,è semplicemente un riferimento ad Anno 2000 - La corsa della morte,con la presenza di Sylvester Stallone,quindi non c è molto da aggiungere a riguardo.
Il gameplay è strutturato come un semplice gioco di corse qualsiasi,solo che invece di correre dovrete anche ammazzare gente,raccogliere potenziamenti in giro per la mappa e riparare ed aggiornare la vostra macchina in vari tipi,come paraurti e scudo.
La grafica....
....
ODDIO,la grafica,pur essendo un gioco del 1997 è davvero ricca di dettagli.
Molto gore e molto realistica specialmente quando le persone vengono spappolate e volano per aria,tralatro non sono presenti soltanto le persone ma anche gli animali,e quà animalisti state zitti e rovesciatevi ai testimoni di Geova con il vostro perbenismo.
Le auto,non le ho contate ma saranno più di 20 nel gioco,ognuna ispirata ad un modello reale e caratteristica in ogni forma e dimensione.
Poi per l'uso di attori veri per la rappresentazione dei personaggi la trovo una buonissima idea,dato che sono stati realizzati abbastanza bene,con un greenscreen e vi dirò,le botte che prendiamo nel gioco in realtà le prendono anche gli attori dal vivo,quindi sono molto credibili le loro espressioni sul volto.
Il gioco ancora non l'ho finito,quindi dopo questa recensione mi spiccerò e andrò a completare questa opera d'arte ma posso solo dirvi che alla lunga il gioco potrebbe stancarvi ma vi farà divertire molto anche durante i momenti di noia.
Unica critica che faccio è che ogni volta che esco dal desktop il gioco diventerà nero ma non preoccupatevi,basta uscire due volte dal desktop ovvero:Appena accade la prima volta,uscite la prima,rientrate nel gioco e se vedete ancora nero,rientrate ancora una volta ed il gioco è fatto.
Da prendere in offerta quando costa meno di 5 euro poichè 8 euro è un prezzo troppo alto per un gioco d'epoca e tralatro,un altra cosa che rode il culo a me è che il gioco non sia una versione Windows ma una versione emulata su Dosbox ma non mi importa alla fine,mi piace giocare con la tastiera.
Tralatro mi rode il culo che questo gioco sia stato censurato e visionato da noi italiani dal parlamento italiano per rimuovere il sangue e altri contenuti dal gioco,davvero andate all'inferno e giudicate il vostro moralismo da qualche altra parte per favore.
Recensirò il secondo capitolo quando mi capiterà,ma per ora concludo questa recensione sanguinosa e buona fortuna,piloti carneficiosi.
8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197971719465', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1689955852}
review: This game is in my top three of all time. I played it back in 1998 on my mom's Cyrix II 233Mhz PC with only integrated graphics. It was a blast and I played it for years. Seeing it back now on modern PCs, Android, and iOS is awesome. If you haven't tried this game, you really should give it a shot, it's cheap, usually goes on sale for like $3 sometimes. It's dumb fun and the physics and vehicle mechanics are still better than some of the games released today.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314002010', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1689117517}
review:
É um bom jogo. Gostava bastante de jogar quando mais novo, e até hoje ainda gosto. Possuí uma boa variedade de carros (que vai se conquistando ao decorrer das corridas), mapas e a trilha sonora também é excelente! 

Minhas reclamações do jogo em si vão apenas para a falta de suporte de controle e nem todos os botões serem configuráveis (dá pra contornar esse problema usando um programinha externo). Em quesito dessa versão da Steam, a reclamação fica para a maneira que ela roda, até mesmo em PCs high-end. Rodando no modo 3Dfx, o framerate é maior, entretanto o jogo é mais instável, com algumas falhas no sons, gráficos e até travamentos ao pausar às vezes. Em contrapartida, rodando no modo Software, o framerate é mais baixo, porém não tem os problemas citados acima do modo 3Dfx.

Enfim, com minha experiência até o momento digo que está jogável, mas não totalmente estável. Fique ciente destes problemas e possua um PC razoavelmente bom, mesmo que o jogo seja de 1997. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197983240067', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1687981240}
review:
Лучший гоночный симулятор всех времен. 
- Лучшая в жанре физика заносов (главное уметь)
- Лучшая графика и внимание к деталям.
- Лучшая игра серии
- Лучшее управление (советую numPad + Space + Backspace + Ins - больше ничё не понадобится)
- Лучший сюжет
- Лучшие пешеходы
- Лучшие бочки
- Офигенный набор машин на выбор
- Можно таранить копов до посинения
- Кто ставит плохие отзывы - тот просто не умеет.

upd: 
- наиграно 2000 часов - не меньше, просто steam не учитывает, что было 20 лет назад =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198069330773', 'num_games_owned': 636, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1683658944}
review:
It's a great game early on in the first half of the levels, unlocking cars is random. The later levels are such a hassle with all the ramps and so MANY LAPS oh my god and don't even think of trying to destroy everyone when you have to go looking for them for minutes. The controls are utter garbage too. When you want to play a classic game though this is sadly what you have to go through.

The core of this game is great, and a fun idea, but it get's dragged out so poorly.  I imagine this was way better back in the day. Didn't age well, but I respect it if you can get past all the jank of a DOS era game then you'll be fine just be prepared to suffer through bits of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198352828985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1683470450}
review:
The car drives like a tank on ice, at every turn you'll take the wrong trajectory, at every ramp you'll overturn for no apparent reason. I couldn't mute the music in any way (it's not loud anyway, but the option doesn't work, removing the files didn't work for me, replacing them with silent files of the same format didn't work either). Controls suck, no keybinding, no WASD, just a pre-selection of awkward configurations. If you use alt-tab sometimes strange things happen, like all the writings disappearing.

So... why the positive rating and my full support? Because it's friggin Carmageddon, that's why. If you played it in the 90s you know exactly what I mean and I think you would agree.

For everyone else, if they're not looking for an experience that clearly shows its age, perhaps it's best to move on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198250049674', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 3381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3381, 'last_played': 1682781056}
review: Was quite a fun game. The freedom you have as to how you approach races feels really good and you have the opportunity to actually explore the map and find hidden spots, without having too worry that you're gonna fall behind. I played on the hardest difficulty, which was indeed quite a challenge, but the lower difficulties are a lot more relaxed and can also be a very chill game (depends what you want). However, I did have some crashes, which at times were rather discouraging and would be nice if they released an update fixing it. I also played the original DOSbox version, because I could run it windowed mode, but the 3dfx version works fine as well, as long as you don't tab other cause you're sure ain't tabbing back in. But if you don't mind not tabbing out the 3dfx version actually looks much better and felt more immersive (partly because of the fullscreen). Also the game is pretty much 2 in 1 (Max Pack and Splat Pack) and found Max Pack more difficult and it had more races, but I'd recommend playing it first, because while Splat Pack was easier and shorter, its last level just felt like the perfect awesome conclusion to the combined game. All in all it was a pretty neat game, just needs some fixes.

review: Классная игра. Когда-то в детстве она была установлена на мой компьютер, но я боялся её запускать из-за ярлыка. Одна из первых моих игр. Но управление конечно не супер удобное, а так всем советую данную игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059391379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 898, 'last_played': 1503587412}
review:
The first Carmageddon was my first PC game I've played in PC Caves back in the day. This is why Carmageddon is my fav racing game at all times.
Carmageddon Max Pack was a game that many of us grew up playing, and for good reason. The game was a masterpiece of vehicular combat, featuring a huge variety of cars, weapons, and environments to explore.

Playing Carmageddon Max Pack was a rush like no other. The feeling of slamming into an opponent at high speed, sending them careening off the road and into a wall, was incredibly satisfying. And the game's wide range of weapons, from chainsaws to machine guns, made sure that the carnage never got old.

But perhaps the most memorable aspect of Carmageddon Max Pack was its environments. Whether you were racing through a city, a suburban neighborhood, or a desert wasteland, each level was full of secrets to uncover and obstacles to overcome. And with the game's open-world design, you were free to explore to your heart's content, discovering hidden areas and power-ups that could give you an edge in battle.

The graphics and sound design in Carmageddon Max Pack were also top-notch, with impressive visuals and a soundtrack that perfectly captured the game's frenzied atmosphere.

Looking back on it now, playing Carmageddon Max Pack feels like a trip down memory lane. It's a game that reminds us of a simpler time, when we could spend hours on end racing, battling, and exploring without a care in the world. If you're feeling nostalgic for the games of your childhood, Carmageddon Max Pack is a must-play.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994002775', 'num_games_owned': 6538, 'num_reviews': 1438, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1676331617}
review:
Ah... Carmageddon, I think many fans of this franchise got interested in the game through many visits to a friend or cousin who had the game on a pre 2000s windows computer.

The game also works on a steam deck, although I found the framerates to be surprisingly lower than expected at times, but you can watch a snippet of gameplay here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKokKyonMqY

Where pedestrians just can't walk away from your incoming vehicle fast enough and cows shit blood.
Welcome to the chaotic and murderous world of Carmageddon, where your opponents are a bunch of lunatics and killing machines, and secretly you are too during the events of this game.

You gain time by mowing the locals or hitting vehicles, so do as you please! 
Combining insane power-ups, surreal environments and different ways to win, the game guarantees endless hours of violent and hilarious entertainment.

Max Damage features 30 vehicles and ten environments. The game also includes a Career Mode, an Action Replay Mode and a multiplayer mode with four types of events, don't ask me how many races there are to do because there really are a lot of them, and a good thing, this is a game that never gets boring!

author: {'steamid': '76561198001477300', 'num_games_owned': 2057, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 2129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2129, 'last_played': 1622967406}
review:
Absolute mega classic. Have fun driving around in awesome cars, driving over pedestrians and trying to ram your opponents to death.

The enemy AI is brainless, but it doesn't really need to be any more than that. The pure random carnage is endlessly entertaining.

You can win a stage in 3 different ways:
Kill all pedestrians: These are usually in the hundreds and takes quite a time to achieve if you don't use the electric beam car.
Finish the race: The most boring way to win. Opponents don't even try to race, and afaik it's not even possible to lose by an opponent finishing.
Kill all your opponents: The proper way to play.

The game makes use of teleporting your opponents around you at high speed when you're not looking, and this causes so much random fun carnage of opponents just flying around and randomly ramming things. Some of the most entertaining things I've ever experienced.

Later in the game, especially in the Splat Pack expansion that is included in the game, do require you to replay levels quite a lot in order to progress in the game. This is pretty much my only complaint about the game. But considering how fun it is, I could replay this game to no end anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561198928640547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1691939724}

author: {'steamid': '76561198303672282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1709932667}
review: Jak dla mnie jest to gra z niemożliwą wręcz grywalnością. Pierwszy raz grałem w nią u szwagra i to z powodu niej złożyłem pierwszego kompa. Voodoo na pokładzie robiło robotę. Potem miałem coraz nowsze systemy i na każdy z nich instalowałem tą grę. Miałem też parę lat przerwy, ale kupiłem (kolejny raz) tym razem na Steam i gram. Gram, gram, gram i gram. I tak już 25 lat. Polecam każdemu boomerowi, bo młodzi nie ogarną na czym polega jej fenomen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198449661826', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1672379349}
review:
Carmageddon: The Racing Game for the Chemically Imbalanced.

Back in 1997, Stainless Games predicted how the world would look like in 2026: fatal toxins will pollute the earth's atmosphere spreading sickness among the population, multinational corporations will turn the oceans into yellow acid pools, and living in a big city will be a synonymous of a violent death.

A dystopian world indeed, and Stainless Games came up with a way to interact with this world: annihilate everything.

To kill for the sake of killing, men, women, children, grannies, pregnants, cattle, sheep, penguins, cops, prostitutes, miners and divers, their guts must see the sunlight, all methodically slaughtered, in the most creative way.

Because your goal in this new earth is to turn it into a vast altar upon which all that is living must be sacrificed without end, without measure, without pause, until the consummation of things, until evil is extinct, until the death of death.

The bad part is that this version unlike an Android port published some years back, hasn't been remastered. So you'll have to stick with DOSBox to run it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344389941', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1672254550}
review:
[h1]PROS[/h1]

-Running over people and cows is obviously fun.

-90’s graphics.

-90’s metal music. I swear one of the guitar rifts is taken straight out of the Johnny Cage vs Scorpion fight from the 1995 Mortal Kombat movie, big if true.

-FMV videos of the drivers’ faces while driving is charming as fuck.

-Die Anna is an absolute QT, and I love most of her FMV face reactions while driving. Unfortunate side note: whenever you flip your car over the FMV of Die Anna does that weird Jenna Ortega Wednesday Addams sperg lord face (you know the gif), and it takes me out of the 90’s.

[h1]CONS[/h1]

-The controls are very very very sloppy. You can’t just hold down RT and wiggle the left analog stick, you will die, so you need to sort of just tap the gas here and there. And OF COURSE you will need to JoyToKey yourself a proper controller scheme. 

-The game can crash on you.

[h1]OVERALL THOUGHTS[/h1]

90’s Charm vs Sloppy Controls…

…I am going to recommend this game, but be warned, it will be extremely painful…..FOR YOU!! DEEP DISCOUNT ONLY.

author: {'steamid': '76561198184596858', 'num_games_owned': 3086, 'num_reviews': 918, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 431, 'last_played': 1666460193}
review:
Carmageddon is no ordinary car racing game, it's not about who crosses the finish line in 1st place. Carmageddon is about accumulating as many points as you can until you conclude one of the objectives (before the time ends): By wasting all of your opponents, killing everyone, or crossing all the checkpoints.

This version includes two editions: Max Pack and Splat Pack, and at the start you can even pick between the 3DFX version or the normal version. Although this game runs in DOSBox (it brings some issues, such as not being able to Alt + Tab without bugging the game), there's not much else to complain about. Thanks to nGlide, you can also run the game in high resolutions!

The game is really fun, and violent, with cool car designs, and with an awesome soundtrack! Undoubtedly, a timeless classic!

author: {'steamid': '76561198413079469', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1710, 'last_played': 1547352686}
review: В целом игра понравилась, нестандартные правила для гонок разбить машины соперников или передавить людей. Интересные особенности игры: Можно менять позицию машины при старте гонки. Удобная карта, при её открытии появляется дополнительное окно которое позволяет следить за происходящим в гонке во время просмотра карты. Прикольная починка машины при зажатии кнопки ремонта машина расправляет помятые части корпуса в прежнее состояние. Камера водителя позволяет наблюдать за его реакцией. Более весело с видом из кабины давить людей потому что можно их разглядеть а с видом сзади прыгать или врезаться. За прохождение гонок начисляется рейтинг цель добраться с 99 к рейтингу 1.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965828391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1669697160}
review: I fired this old gem up for nostalgia's sake.  went to the control settings and went "oh... yeah... i remember how bad this was now..."  Go ahead, try to change the controls to something that makes sense.  "Up, Down, Left, Right..." nope.... "W,S,A,D?" Nope... okay, let me get my controller.. Calibrate and... oh, it's never calibrated well enough to change your controls.  the moment you select the control you want to chage it's now "joy1 up."  What's the solution, go into the game files and find the keymap and change it my dang-self with text editor. But why can't the company who i payed money for the game do this? I mean i did it in 5 minutes, why wouldn't the people trying to make money off this game spend MINUTES adding modern sensibility into this game?

author: {'steamid': '76561198043314158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1678762258}
review:
SVGA car crashing and ped crushing galore!
If you watched Death Race or any demolition derby stuff on tape growing up, and thought "hey I want to do that and crush pixelated people too!" this is the game for you.

+Pros
+Retro graphics
+3dfx mode for those who want a smoother look!
+Fear factory made some of the music

~Neutrals
~Dosbox is the emulator of this version, and this version always starts in 640x480. My modern monitors really don't like 640x480, or anything below 720p. This can be altered by changing video settings using one of the community guides.

-Cons
-Not much soundtrack, and the limited amount of music gets old fast.
-Old graphics. Sometimes, it just looks like dog shit.
-Control schemes in this game are absolutely bizarro, and some of the buttons are hard coded for functions, so you can't use WASD without altering game files. That's a huge bummer. I found the best control scheme for the driving buttons is to use HOME for gas END for brake DELETE for turn left and PAGEDOWN for turn right.
-3DFX Support is not user friendly in the Windows 10 era to get running. I installed nGlide and followed an offsite tutorial for nGlide in DOSBox. For someone who tinkers with modding or whatever, it's not a huge deal. But for someone who is new to retro PC gaming, and knows nothing about anything, it would be a massive stretch to learn how to do everything needed to get the best graphics out of this version of the game.
-My Ryzen 5700g will not run this in DOSBox at full speed with maximum graphics settings enabled. I think it might be a limitation of DOSBox, but that was worth mentioning because the 5700g isn't exactly a cheap or underpowered part. Turning down some of the settings GREATLY improves frame pacing and allows me to run this on an older zotac zbox with a i5 5200u and gtx960, so I really think its a DOSBox limitation somewhere.
-Sound crackling is absurdly common in this game. I never played the original on retro hardware, so I dont know if that was just the way it was or if the crackling was introduced in this version, but I can't find any useful information online to fix the crackling. It only appears when multiple cars are near each other, or if the same sound effects are overlapping, but it is extremely distracting at times.

6.9/10, but its just barely not a 7. Play Carmageddon 2, it is much better in every way. If it had more music, it would be a 7.

author: {'steamid': '76561198951979183', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1583589421}
review:
Tinha lembranças de ter jogado quando adolescente uma demo desse jogo. Agora, muito tempo depois, encontrei na Steam e descobri que era melhor ter deixado só na lembrança…

A jogabilidade não é boa, o controle do veículo é algo que não se classifica nem como arcade ou simulação, é simplesmente ruim. 

Talvez por ter sido proibido em muitos países na época isso tenha chamado mais a atenção do que a experiência do jogo em si. 

Enjoei em 20 minutos.

review:
Плохой издатель THQ Nordic продолжает стабильно получать деньги с продаж, а техническое обслуживание продуктов, издателем которых он является, производить отказывается. 

То есть THQ Nordic не исполняет свои прямые обязанности, и кладёт болт на многие тысячи игроков, которые этому нерадивому издателю заплатили свои кровные деньги, а взамен получили плохого качества творение.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056812873', 'num_games_owned': 1135, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 975, 'last_played': 1639487312}
review:
[h1] Легендарный Кармагеддон [/h1]
[u]Carmageddon (1997)[/u] – пожалуй, такой же первопроходец введения насилия в играх как [u]Doom (1993)[/u] и [u] Grand Theft Auto III (2001).[/u] Проект вышел в удивительное время, когда видеоигры считались сугубо детским развлечением, а на сцене игровой индустрии уже долгое время были Марио и Соник. Амбициозная группа разработчиков из Stainless Software не побоялась сделать яркое высказывание, наполненное мясом, разбитыми капотами и жестокостью. Название игры, состоящее из [i]car[/i] и [i]Armageddon[/i] стало поистине нарицательным в момент выхода игры.

Из-за особо жестокого игрового процесса, в ряде стран игра была выпущена с цензурой — люди и животные были заменены на зомби (Великобритания), либо роботов (Германия). Позже в Великобритании игра была переиздана без цензуры. В Бразилии игра была полностью запрещена к продаже, а в Австралии вышла версия без цензуры с рейтингом MA15+.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681217150 
Лично я уже был знаком с серией по… мягко скажем, не самой лучше игре серии [u]Carmageddon TDR2000,[/u] Где создатели сделали ту же ошибку, что и Croteam в [u]Serious Sam 2:[/u] добавили неуместной мультяшности к по сути жестокому игровому процессу. Но с оригинальным «Кармагеддоном» я познакомился благодаря мобильным портам на iOS и Android. И она на долгое время стала у меня настольной игрой. 

Едешь в долгую поездку? Скучно на уроке труда или ОБЖ? Застрял в многочасовой пробке? Карманная «Карма» для Вас всего за пару кликов на телефоне или планшете. Поэтому с уверенностью могу сказать, что знаю эту игру просто наизусть, пройдя её на всех уровнях сложности множество раз и выбив все достижения. И для меня было неподдельным интересом ознакомиться с оригинальной версией игры в Steam под заголовком Max Pack.

[h1]Игровой процесс[/h1]
В игре представлен приличный автопарк, имеется куча карт и даны три вида прохождения каждого уровня:
[olist]
    [*] Самый задористый и, как по мне, самый лёгкий способ – разбить все машины соперников. К этому предрасполагает сама игра, ведь оппоненты так и норовят влететь в тебя то тут, то там.
    [*] Для тех, кто сюда не за ультранасилием пришёл – пройти все чекпойнты и круги на карте. Самый «классический» способ прохождения. Вот реально, зачем тебе Carmageddon, когда есть Need for Speed? Ты ж сюда точно коров давить пришёл, это же очевидно.
    [*] И самый, пожалуй, трудный способ – убить всех пешеходов. Почему трудный? Потому что искусственный интеллект у машинок 25-летней выдержки не особо выдающийся, и каждый уже заранее запрограммирован на первый способ прохождения. Поэтому данное прохождение уровня требует максимально аккуратного вождения. Впрочем, пройти его намного легче, когда у Вас появляется машина, которая убивает пешеходов током на расстоянии.
[/olist]
Стоит учесть, что в игре также имеется три вида сложности: лёгкая, средняя и сложная, соответственно. Отличаются они поведением соперников на дорогах, количеством очков, за которое можно делать починку автомобиля, и временем, которое даётся за прохождение уровня.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681225857 
[h1]Техническое исполнение[/h1]
В данном издании есть две версии: оригинальная из 1997-ого года и с 3Dfx эмуляцией. Первая покажет Вам все красоты графики 1997-ого года, но в ней отсутствует оверлей. Вторая – эта более осовременененная версия игры с 3D-модельками и улучшенной дальностью прорисовки. И да, в ней уже есть оверлей, но работает он так себе с учётом разрешения игры в 640 x 480.

Что смутило лично меня, так это то, что игра сама по себе запускается через эмулятор DOSBox. Это говорит, что перед нами не переиздание игры, а простой запуск через эмулятор. По полному ценнику 249 pуб. за эмулятор. Это печально.

Не могу не отметить, что есть [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=659814321]лайфхаки,[/url] о том, как запустить игру в разрешении 1920 x 1080, но, честно говоря, я бы этого не делал по двум причинам. Во-первых, мыльцо сразу попадёт в глаза (это я про качество текстур). Игре 25 лет всё-таки, я бы пожалел и себя, и её. Во-вторых, теряется, не знаю, какой-то дух оригинала. То, что хорошо смотрится на маленьком экране, должно смотреться хорошо именно на маленьком экране.

[h1]Музыкальное сопровождение[/h1]
Стоит ещё отметить, что у игры просто незабываемый саундтрек за авторством групп Lee Groves и Fear Factory. Не с чем не спутаю эти завывания какого-то электронного инструмента из трека [url= https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJi73_mr7BM&ab_channel=KilljoyXP ]Lee Groves – Coastal[/url] и пафос рок-гитары из [url= https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MCF5jw_zhD8&ab_channel=Edgecrusherdk] Fear Factory – Zero Signal.[/url] Поистине великолепное аудио-сопровождение. Как же приятно устраивать анархию на дорогах под тяжёлые басы и гитарные звуки. 

[h1]Графическая составляющая[/h1]
Знаете, есть категория игр, которая устаревает. Например, оригинальный [u]Half-Life.[/u] Квадратные руки, не всегда удобное управление, натянутые текстуры. С Carmageddon такого не случилось. И не поймите меня неправильно, я не оправдываю игру своим фанатством. Просто даже ремейк оригинала [u]Carmageddon: Max Damage (2016)[/u] смотрится в разы хуже, чем оригинальная игра. Тут дело скорее в уместном перенесении оригинальных идей в новую обертку, как было с [u]Doom (2016).[/u] Просто порой, что смотрелось хорошо в те времена, смотрится хорошо и сейчас, но переосмыслению просто физически не подлежит. 

Возьмите старые и новые [u]«Утиные истории».[/u] В оригинальном мультсериале есть дух приключений, задор и фирменный юмор. А в переосмыслении не хватает… чего-то, что делает «Утиные истории» по-настоящему теми самыми «утиными». Та же история и с Carmageddon.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GyWFX0FPhOA&ab_channel=kazimann 
[h1]Итог[/h1]
[b] Подводя итог, хочу сказать, что первая игра в серии до сих пор остаётся в ней лучшей. Несмотря на продолжения и переосмысления ничто не заменит тех спрайтовых ёлочек и плоских NPC, которые под испуганные крики смачно превращаются в кровавое месиво. Carmageddon – поистине игра-легенда. И я надеюсь, что THQ Nordic, недавно выкупившая права на серию, найдёт уместное применение наследию этой серии. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198265009298', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 19738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19670, 'last_played': 1704990650}
review: Nie wiem dokładnie co mnie ciągnie do serii "Carmageddon". Ale coś musi w niej być skoro w zwykłej grze DOS'owej mam nabite (w chwili pisania recenzji) ponad 300h. Może odejście od reguł? Zamiast ścigania się kto pierwszy dojedzie do mety, można sobie zjechać na pobocze i wprasować w ziemię cywili. Właściwie nie można tylko trzeba, inaczej dogoni nas licznik czasu i po ptokach. Licznik jest tutaj naszym jedyny wrogiem, bo nie da się tu zginąć. Ów licznik można nabić rozjeżdżaniem przechodniów, rozbijaniem się o wrogów czy zbieraniem beczek dających nam premię do czasu. Każdą trasę można zwyciężyć na trzy sposoby: Najłatwiej rozbić wszystkich wrogów w drobny pył, trochę trudniej (i nudniej) przejechać wszystkie trasy lub najtrudniej - rozjechać wszystkich setek pieszy na całej mapie. Dzięki temu ostatniemu nagradzani jesteśmy dodatkowymi kredytami. Ów kredyty można wydać na ulepszenie do maksimum naszego pojazdu. Następne trasy można odblokować nie kończąc ich, a pozycją w rankingu od 100 do 1. Kiedy dana trasa do odblokowania potrzebuje pozycji w rankingu np. 82 a my mamy 83, potrzeba ponownie przejść poprzednie trasy i w ten sposób pozycję w rankingu sobie zmniejszyć. Warto też wspomnieć o ścieżce dźwiękowej, która według mnie jest genialna. W Carmageddon'ie posłuchać możemy zespołu "Fear Factory", którego dzięki tej grze poznałem i ich albumu "Demanufacture". Oprócz nich jest także genialny kompozytor Lee Groves. Edycja Max Pack tej gry zawiera także oficjalny dodatek "Splat Pack" na którego nie miałem czasu, więc się nie wypowiem. Grę ukończyłem całą w wersji DOS'owej (według mnie lepszy klimat), na najtrudniejszym poziomie trudności i starając się przejść wszystkie trasy eliminując przechodniów (Protip: przy eliminowaniu wszystkich setek pieszy warto wyposażyć się w power-up z jednej z beczek który pokazuje nam ich położenie na całej mapie, inaczej bliskie niemożliwemu jest rozjechanie wszystkich pieszy). Grę również można odpalić w wersji 3DFX, co poprawia grafikę dostosowując się do dzisiejszych rozdzielczości. Warto też wspomnieć o mało znanej funkcji - wciśnięcie przycisku "Z" na klawiaturze na początku trasy zanim narrator doliczy do zera, pozwoli zlikwidować czekanie i wyprzedzić wrogów, jednak zostanie nałożona na nas grzywna w wysokości 1000 kredytów za bycie "Bad boy'em". Intro tej gry na początku jest w hói epickie i daje przedsmak tego co nas czeka. Prawie 330 godzin zabawy za 9zł na przecenie to prawie jak za darmo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081588794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1645434757}
review:
A little austere, but almost as good as I remembered it!

Under 3 bucks for both Carmageddon 1 and the crazy Splat Pack was too good to pass up. I followed the guides "Controls - using arrow keys instead" and "Quick tweak guide to SVGA software mode + higher res 3dfx mode", ran in 3DFX mode, and was back having  a good time, remembering the crazy hidden areas (toxic waste facility near a ski resort!). The car physics is weird but the destruction is great.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005610787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2449, 'last_played': 1709522323}
review:
Although the game is repetitive overall, I enjoy the crap out of this game!! I can't seem to get enough of the demo derby action! A classic working well in a modern machine makes the game really satisfying to continue playing instead of the constant crashes at the first track on old DOS.

The AI can really be jerks, enough to push your buttons and go nuclear over them. What compensated the nuisance, though, was burning through the ranks in the game.
I noticed that the cars that are earned seemed to mean to be useful in certain ranks rather than going for just one car throughout the game. In the highest ranks, it was satisfying to total police rams more than the opponents in the game.

This is definitely worth the purchase!! It made Christmas several years ago so awesome to play when snow really fell. I became so satisfied with the purchase as a result.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987014665', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1984, 'last_played': 1693932337}
review:
I remember playing this game as a kid/teenager. One of the best back then in 1997 and still one of the best in 2021. You just cannot describe how much fun this game delivers. After 24 years... I have completed it for the first time. 32 hours of amazing fun and guess what?

After 32 hours of amazing pure gaming fun you get tons of after-game bonuses you can have fun with all over again¬!! I wanted to skip straight to Carmageddon 2 after this but you just cannot... There is so much to unblock yet and so many things you can play with.

If you could marry games. This one would be my WIFE.

- amazing cars
- amazing humour
- awesome physics
- each car has its own advantages and disadvantages
- you can get/unblock every single car you see by playing
- super fun open world racing tracks
- how often do you pull your handbrake to slide your car in order smash as many as possible people in one go!? I mean this is just pure 90s godness.
- the fun never ends...
- going top speed for a head-on crash just never gets boring
- bigger the car = bigger the weight = send them opponents to another realm with that crash you've just delivered
- power ups
- upgrades/tuning
- cool music


It is not just nostalgia... It is what all games should be about = pure fun and joy. It is so ironic that in 2021 where we have so many so-called amazing next gen games they almost all fail to deliver... 

Try it. You will not regret it. I cannot wait to play all other carmageddon games after this one...

This game is a part of me and I am so damn proud of the fact that it has been with me since my early days/

When all the world falls apart... this game holds it together.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050237511', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1633907738}
review:
Es una mezcla entre carrera por tiempo y battle royale de autos chocadores. Lo novedoso es que hay gente y animales dando vuelta por el mapa que podés llevarte puestos de forma sangrienta y eso te suma plata y tiempo. Algo llamativo es que te podés reparar en el medio de la carrera mientras corrés, pero te cuesta dinero. Los precios son elevados, pero salvan las papas del fuego. El humor loco que tiene le da un toque (en la descripción del juego leete el primer párrafo donde dice "HISTORY"). Vas ganando plata por carreras y desbloqueando autos para comprarlos y mejorarlos, cada uno con sus stats. 
Es una emulación de la versión de MS-DOS. Los controles son sólo con teclado (y no se pueden cambiar porque están mal emulados). Tiene su lugar en el salón de la fama y del recuerdo pero ya no da para recomendarlo. 
El precio de AR$ 130 me parece bien.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979084213', 'num_games_owned': 4500, 'num_reviews': 1010, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1405403484}
review:
Carmageddon is one of my favorite games ever. I have so many fond memories of it, it was so much fun. Back in 1997 it was considered very controversial because of its violent nature (which was exaggerated, even back then). Let’s take a more in-depth look if you ever want to give it a try.

The concept of Carmageddon is basically quite simple: it’s like a racing game, but also not really, because there are multiple ways to get through a level or race.
You start each level in a big open world (back then at least) where you can go wherever you like right after you’ve started a race (and you can cheat a little and press a button to start driving before the announcer is done counting down… and run him over). Among the levels are a street, mountain area and an area with a beach.
Anyway, you can either: finish the race by racing laps, killing of all of the pedestrians in a level (which is time consuming) or destroy all of your opponents. And the fun really starts with these last two choices.
The vehicles in this game are not just your regular vehicles, no sir, for example; they consist of a hearse, a tow truck and a monster truck, all with their own deadly attachments ((saw)blade, spikes, et cetera). And they’re driven by people like O.J. Stimpson. Pure madness. And fun.
These cars can be destroyed. Annihilated. Pulverized. Anything. They’re completely destructible and for me that was even more fun than running over pedestrians (which resulted in gore, and points earned). But almost always it was a bit of both.
Driving at an opponent at full speed, seeing parts of the car fly off or the car itself get dented is immensely satisfying.
At different times wrecked (‘Wasted!’) cars can also be stolen, just by destroying them. But that depends on the level itself and the car. I think all of them could be stolen (and naturally driven) by the end of the game, including an extremely overpowered cop car (Squad Car) that would take ages to even take down. But by then you should already have (almost) finished the game.
You start the game at Rank 99 and then you climb the ladder by finishing races. I’m not sure if it’s random or not; I never found out how to climb up to a specific rank back in the day.
Power-ups are also scattered through the levels in different kind of colored containers. These contain all sorts of zany power-ups like pedestrians being glued to the ground, getting zapped by electricity shot out of your car or turning your car into granite. They always spawn at the same place, they’re not randomized.
Also, it didn’t actually add anything to the gameplay - but it did add to the atmosphere - but I just want to mention the Pratcam. A camera in the upper left corner that showed Max Damage or Die Anna reacting to your driving skills. Fun times!

This pack also contains the Splat Pack DLC which was a separate add-on back in the days, containing more levels, power-ups and cars, if I remember correctly. So good value all in all.

Graphics wise Carmageddon was insanely pretty, with nicely detailed 3D vehicles that had destructible physics unlike any game I’ve ever played back in those days. The levels were large and had clear textures. The pedestrians were actually 2D sprites, made with different angles, and this is obviously logical since there can be hundreds of pedestrians in a level and PCs weren’t as powerful back then.
I think the game had heavy metal kind of music in it. The sound effects consisted of lifelike, but higher pitched screams for pedestrians and metal clashing into metal for the cars. It was quite realistic in a game-y sort of way.

Carmageddon still is to this day a great game, with no other games quite like it. Sure, it’s dated by now, but give it a try if you like old school games and I can assure you you’ll have a good time with it.

[quote]If you enjoyed this review please consider following me: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41144728-markdj/]curator page[/url] [/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198081296862', 'num_games_owned': 3185, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1687248538}
review:
DOS версия без каких либо значимых изменений (имеется ввиду адаптация под современные машины, )
При запуске предлагает запустить обычную DOS версию и DOS с поддержкой 3dfx, работает через DOSBox и Nпlide
Обычную я и не запускал, а вот 3dfx выдавал у меня 15-20 кадров, особенно FPS падал при столкновениях.
Что бы всё стало лучше, надо ставить Unofficial Max Pack 95 Restoration Project Pack, но и так не всё так хорошо
+ есть поддержка widescreen
+ есть поддержка высоких разрешений
- Видео и меню очень мелкое и висит в левом верхнем углу

Если вы молоды и у вас есть силы и желание что бы приводить игру к более играбельному состоянию то вперёд)

Ранее, они же выпускали версию для android/ios, вот не могли взять её и просто перенести на ПК
Запуск же как её так и старых версий можно бы было оставить опциональным.

А так, при покупке игры вы не получаете полноценный продукт, а то что надо доводить до ума что бы в этой можно было без проблем сейчас поиграть.

Рекомендую ли я это дело покупать, нет.
Лучше найдите какой ни будь доделанный репак и скачав его, получите то, что можно просто установить и играть.

review: Сколько же шума в своё время понаделал эта игра. А ещё она вполне могла стать частью франшизы “Безумный Макс” да не сложилось. Зато давка пешеходов и коров ради дополнительного времени пришлась людям по вкусу. Вообще если внимательно посмотреть стартовый ролик, то становится понятным, что нормальные люди во время соревнований ныкаются по домам. Так что происходящее можно воспринимать, как энсьерро постапокалиптического будущего (есть такой праздник в Испании). Теперь о главном, жестокость оставим за скобками, всё таки это вкусовщина. К оригинальному Carmageddon у меня по сути одна претензия - скучные последние уровни из-за надоедливой полиции. К Max Pack вопросов побольше, конечно спасибо что позволил запускать игру без танцев с бубнами, но что мешало добавить вам нормальные разрешение и управление непонятно. И отмечу, что проверку временем старичок всё таки не прошёл, мучиться с допотопной физикой ради кровавых ошмётков уже не так весело. Поставлю 8.0 за веселые моменты в детстве, сейчас впечатлений хватает максимум на 6.0.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983225082', 'num_games_owned': 864, 'num_reviews': 321, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1624603951}
review:
This is a hard game to recommend when the android works and looks so much better. The android is also free. If you have a android tablet try carmageddon. Like I say it looks better then this version and runs better no work involved. This version requires work from the user to get it running correctly. First issue no joystick support so your going to need something like joy2key program that allows you to use a joystick with this game that does not support joysticks.  The other issue terrible in game music that cannot be turned off in game. Their is a solution but it again requires work from the user. 

Once you have put in the work to get these problems fixed the game can be fun. However like I say the android version just works and looks better without having the user do anything to get it to run great and its Free. I enjoy the game on android and not on the PC. Its to much work. If your going to get one of these get the newest version or Carmageddon 2 on GOG as its currently on sale for under 3 dollars and its a lot easier to get working correctly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075767343', 'num_games_owned': 3660, 'num_reviews': 500, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1467152402}
review:
Simplesmente uma lenda, me deu muitas horas de alegria, joguei por longos anos e era excelente até na versão shareware, simplesmente um masterpiece muito a frente de seu tempo.

Obs.: Talvez para novos jogadores pode ser um pouco incômodo alguns detalhes, como o respawn dos adversários que acontecem aleatoriamente no mapa de modo a sempre estarem próximos do player, assim como as derrapadas e alguns rivais muito chatos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198345574445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1623445057}
review: Best Old School game for total carnage. It's like and older version of Most Wanted, you race a list of 100 different maps and as you progress you unlock new cars and stronger armour for your vehicle. You can win a race buy destroying all your opponents or finishing all the laps. You gain extra time by hitting into your opponents or killing them/pedestrians. It is a game from 1997 so don't expect RTX graphics. Still a GEM OF A GAME. If you like killing and demolishing of opponents give this a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042259317', 'num_games_owned': 4316, 'num_reviews': 414, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1621151243}
review:
How this janky mess of a old game gets so many positive reviews is beyond me. I'm sure it was fine on its proper native hardware, but trying to play it in modern times is a headache and even when I'm in it, I'm not convinced it is such a great game. More a game loved by nostalgia for its zaniness.

This feels like it really needs a "source port" treatment like the Doom/Quake games to make them more playable on modern hardware.

author: {'steamid': '76561198863687366', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1903, 'last_played': 1662895504}
review:
What a classic! 
I personally think this is the best game of the Carmageddon series. Even tho I do realy enjoy playing the new version of the game from 2016: Carmageddon Max Damage/Reincarnation. 
This game kinda gives the same vibe as the older Doom games. And I realy love that kind of game styling. 
Which is actually pretty funny when you think about it. Because this game is actually from 1997. the time that games were still in development. A bit about the "Maim of the game" as they call it in the game. 
You play either as Max Damage, in his Red eagle or as Die Anna, in her Yellow hawk. I chose Max, because he is kinda the face of the game. the first track you'l be playing on is Maim street. A map which takes place in a city with a big football stadium, with ofcourse, 2 football teams you can run over with your four-wheeled killing machine. killing all pedestrians is also 1 of the 3 options of completing a game. But this will take lots of time finding all peds on the map. Running over peds is also a way of getting extra time on your timer. When the timer hits zero, you lose the game. the 2nd option of completing the game is by destroying/killing the other drivers in the race. Which is mostly the best way of completing a game. the game includes big variety of cars. my favorite enemy car is the Stiffshifter. Which is driven by the brothers Grimm. the 3rd option you can choose from is by completing all maps, Which is'nt that fun to do, because the other drivers arent realy trying to "Race" you. And I also dont think an opponent can realy win the race. this is different in the new version of the game.  

If you are into Old/Retro, Doom-styled games, Which includes mad max- like vehicles, weird and insane drivers, a splash of blood, humor, and motor oil. than this is the game for you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042433092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 34963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 223, 'playtime_at_review': 1894, 'last_played': 1712103354}
review: DOS Box running Carmageddon is somewhat buggy. But there are workarounds if you're patient. The main problem is hitting Esc, which is an important function, may black out the game or other oddities. Just Alt-Tab into Steam and back again, once or twice or thrice, and eventually the interface will return to normal. Also, DOS Box takes a long, boring time to quit. It will eventually, so be patient. All in all, this is a brilliant game that I love and will forever love for its total absurdity and joy of mangling and murdering, virtually. It's fun. Be sure to grab the cheats and player created new cars. Max Pack is all new scenarios and cars beyond regular Carmageddon. The pedestrians are 2D, but you won't care, it's so well done.

author: {'steamid': '76561199146572279', 'num_games_owned': 7, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1616179694}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971440424', 'num_games_owned': 1806, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1665243370}
review:
You might need to tweak the resolutions a bit and get used to the controls but after you do, it's pure heaven. 

Carmageddon is a game about crashing into cars, crashing into people and if you're bored actually finishing the race. Wash, rinse, repeat. A very simple formula but super effective. 

Carmageddon is the equivalent of one of those squeezy stressballs with the pop-out eyes. It's also the only unofficial video game adaptation of the cult film "Death Race 2000". That alone is worth the price of admission.

(Frankenstein lives!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198256663538', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1614833333}
review:
Supongo que es por cuestiones de nostalgia que recomiendo este juego

No soy muy fan de las mecanicas (Si quisiera solo destruir cosas en un entorno más justo no sé , jugaria Flatout 2) perosi quieres jugar a este titulo pues bien , aunque no es un port
Usa un emulador y es el juego inicial puramente , con todo lo que esto conlleva y la resolucion por defecto es bajisima y encima puede tener fallos en estabilidad por la compatibilidad

Desde mi punto de vista el port a movil está mucho mejor trabajado , mejores graficos , un menu de mas calidad , es un remaster 
Este tiene la experiencia original , me hubiera gustado que tuviera el modo de matar zombies (no sé si lo traiga , pero por defecto no lo encontré)

author: {'steamid': '76561198091216316', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1173, 'last_played': 1642580888}
review:
Плюсы:
-Красивая графика. Для тех годов очень хорошо смотрится, особенно повреждения автомобилей.
Минусы:
-Ужасное управление.  Раздолбав свое авто об столбы, не пройдя и половины круга в первом же заезде 10+ раз, я понял, что, чтобы дожить до финиша нужно водить не как крутой, отчаянный экстремал, а как 70-летний пенсионер страдающий частичной слепотой.
-Разблокировка автомобилей. Все автомобили открываются после прохождения игры, однако есть возможность открыть их и во время игры. Как? Хороший вопрос. Сколько сайтов и форумов не перечитал, единого метода так и не нашел. Открывать автомобили выбиванием во время гонки, при этом какие-то открываются, а какие-то нет,чтобы открыть автомобили нужно выбивать определенные машины  на определенном ранге, при этом они все равно могут не открыться. Почему? Не та локация, нужно выбить определенное кол-во раз, нужно дождаться определенной фазы луны. Зачем было так это заморачивать?
-Трассы со временем становятся все сложнее и кругов в них больше(последние три трассы-это что-то), а управление лучше не становиться. Поэтому в конце игры вместо напряженной, веселой гонки получаешь нудный экзамен по вождению,
Пару слов о Splat Pack:
-В аддоне разработчики решили развить не тему интересности боев на машинах, а сложность трасс, в результате вместо 70-летнего деда, водить теперь приходиться как 90-летний . Конечно есть в игре и просторные трассы, где можно устроить хорошую свалку, но на большей части локаций  мы либо изображаем черепашку дабы войти в каждый поворот и замедляемся на каждой кочке, чтобы не улететь за текстуры, либо затираем кнопку "вернуться на трассу" до дыр.
По итогу: Надеялся поиграть в  гонки на выживание, а получил симулятор вождения на пенсии.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025447982', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1622842648}
review:
Carmageddon is an amazing, unique game and one of my all-time favourites. For that alone, I have to recommend it. That being said, the version being offered here is frankly quite terrible.

You get to choose between software mode and 3dfx mode. Software mode is visually outdated even by 1997 standards, so most people will play the 3dfx version. Both options run in DOSBox - and while I think there are good DOSBox ports out there, this is not one of them. The menus and cinematics tend to be completely broken. With some config modifications, you can get the 3dfx version to run in a decent resolution (and without stretching) and improve the terrible sprite pop-in, but I've been unable to fix the framerate in any way - and it is awful. These are "only" technical issues, but they're serious enough that I can't honestly recommend playing this specific version of the game.

The real issue here is that Carmageddon is [i]not[/i] abandonware by any means. Just a few years ago, Stainless Games released Carmageddon: Max Damage - a reimagining of the original game which is not nearly faithful enough to be considered a replacement in my opinion. The Max Pack on sale here even has Steam trading cards, so the developers clearly acknowledge its existence, yet they've made no attempt to actually make it a version of the game worth selling on Steam. Most annoyingly, there actually exists a version of Carmageddon that not only runs perfectly but also includes countless little fixes and improvements, essentially making it the ultimate way to play the game - and it's the Android/iOS port. That version is practically perfect, with only the fatal flaw of being mobile-exclusive (meaning that if you want to play it, you'll probably have to use the worst controls imaginable). It also doesn't include the Splat Pack expansion at all.

What we really need is a PC port of the Android/iOS version, with the Splat Pack added as well. Alternatively, if the source code was released to the public, I'm sure some dedicated fans would soon create a proper source port. As things are now, though, Carmageddon is an incredible game that you can't really play properly on modern hardware and you probably won't be happy with the version on offer here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1610203329}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Все таки игры детства нужно оставлять в доброй памяти, чтобы не портить себе впечатления. Это одна из самых любимых игр детства, сейчас в нее играть противно чтоли даже. Кривой порт на досбоксе, который лагует на железе где ГТА 5 норм играется. Раньше на первых пнях летало... Недавно пересматривал с ребенком Утиные Истории... Так вот я тоже это зря сделал. Половина серий просто убоги, а в детстве балдел и считал шедевром каждую серию ) Купить просто чтобы было в библиотеке? Зачем? Насладиться игрой не получилось и дело скорее не в графике а в кривом порте.

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992628937', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1613, 'last_played': 1606591959}
review:
Вкратце для не игравших, Carmageddon - это:

-Стартовать не дождавшись отсчёта - -1000 кредитов
-Сбить неудачника с флагом на старте - +1000 кредитов
-Пройти контрточку - +50 кредитов
-Ударить противника- +200 кредитов
-Ударить противника в лоб - +500 кредитов
-Перевернуться и вернуться на трассу - -4000 кредитов
-Наехать на бабку с ходунками - +100 кредитов
-Наехать на бабку с ходунками на высокой скорости - +400 кредитов + бонус за "размазывание" (splatter)
-Наехать на бабку с ходунками на высокой скорости, сбив её бортом - +600-800 кредитов + бонусы за стиль
-Наехать на бабку с ходунками на высокой скорости, сбив её бортом, будучи перевёрнутым - +1000-1600 кредитов + бонус за артистизм
-Перевернуть машину и сново вернуться на трассу - -4000 кредитов + батхёрт!
-Вынести всех противников - +ок. 15000 кредитов
-Вынести полицейскую машину- +12200 кредитов + радость от создавшейся тишины.
-Влететь в толпу спортсменов на стадионе  под аккомпанемент Fear Factory - Zero Hour - бесценно.

Для всего остального есть" Solid Granite Car"... И "Supressor"! )

author: {'steamid': '76561198043135631', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2248, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1593296148}
review:
And this is what I call the blast from the past.
Carmageddon was great on that PS1 console.
I used to play it a ton when I was just a child.
Even though this game isn't for kids, I know.
But anyways: It's simply a really good game.
Sure, nowadays it's pretty old and outdated.
I'm simply happy that I have it in my steam.
This is a piece of my childhood, I loved this.
So much fun, so much nostalgia, it's great.
It's still quite enjoyable to actually play this.
Honestly, the default price seems too high.
It's over 20 years old at this point, so yeah.
Thankfully I grabbed this during a discount.
And I'm gonna give it a positive review too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103016991', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1603131331}
review:
Le tout ici n'est pas de replacer le jeu dans le contexte de son époque, ni de vous conter la genèse de ce morceau d'histoire controversé du jeu vidéo, mais bel et bien de vous recommander, ou pas, ce titre, aussi sensible au rétro soyez vous, au cas où l'idée vous viendrait à l'idée au détour d'une solde par exemple.

Eh bien non. Certaines oeuvres ont leur place dans un musée. Carmageddon est de celles-ci.
Quasi-injouable aujourd'hui (l'expression "caisse à savon a dû être inventée pour ce jeu, tellement il allie la lourdeur à la maniabilité improbable), les touches peuvent être rebindées mais en réalité ça ne fonctionnera pas car il s'agit bien du jeu original qui tourne sous dosbox donc tenter d'assigner les touches de votre pad moderne sera mission impossible.
Bon courage donc pour maitriser la physique tellement fastidieuse qu'on imagine mal que la manette aurait aidée au problème.
Ajoutez une lenteur étonnante et un aléatoire de tous les instants (les sorties de routes soudaines parce que le modèle physique de la voiture à buté sur du rien en ligne droite est légion) et une difficulté accrue par la complexité à maintenir son véhicule (donc à écraser des piétons qui bougent, seule manière de gagner les précieuses secondes obligatoires pour ne pas être à cours de temps et aller au bout de la course), et saupoudrez des soucis inhérents au fonctionnement sous Doxbox, freeze, bugs audios, et clicks qui ne passent pas dans les menus.... et il ne restera que la bande-son entraînante et les gerbes de sang pour distraire. Ce qui ne suffira pas à combler la frustration.

J'insiste sur le sens de mon avis: est-ce que je vous conseille de jouer à Carmageddon en 2020 et après  (et sûrement des années avant ?): Non. Et pas parce qu'il a vieilli, je ne crache pas sur le retro et pourrait vous inciter à lancer plein d'autres jeux plus ou moins vieux. Simplement parce qu'il a TROP vieilli, et qu'il n'est plus jouable que par quelques fous furieux ou nostalgiques qui ont encore les contrôles d'un autre temps dans les doigts.

Rest In Peace, Carmageddon, après tous les passants que tu as écrasé, ta mort est de bonne guerre

author: {'steamid': '76561198201219735', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 1171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1627768175}
review:
[h1] Serinin ilk ve tartışılmaz en iyi oyunu[/h1]

Bugün bile hâlâ Carmageddon oynamak gerçekten eğlenceli ve bağımlılık yapıyor! Umarım modası geçmez. Stainless Games efsanevi bir oyun yaptı. Devam serilerinde kaliteyi devam ettirememeleri büyük bir utanç. Carmageddon, uzun zamandır piyasadaki en iyi enkaz oyunu olacak gibi görünüyor.

İlk piyasaya sürüldüğünde Carmageddon çok havalıydı. Yıllar sonra ona geri dönersek, kusurları görmezden gelemeyiz. Pek çok bölüm var gibi görünse de, daha çok 7-8 yarış pistinin tekrar tekrar tekrarlanması gibidir.  Bir sonraki yarışın kilidini açmaya yetecek kadar puan almadıysanız, aynı bölümleri oynamak zorunda kalırsınız. Bu, oyunun biraz tekrarlayan bir dezavantajıdır. 

Araba fiziği, zamanına göre (1997) şaşırtıcı derecede iyi. Yeni bir araba seçtiğinizde gerçekten farklı bir şey sürdüğünüzü hissediyorsunuz, vuruşlar ve hasar mekaniği de oldukça gerçekçi. Yayaları zevk için öldürmek, sadece bir oyun oynadığınızı bildiğiniz halde hâlâ çok eğlenceli.
 Birçok insan bilmiyor Carmageddon, Sylvester Stallone'in de oynadığı oldukça iyi bir film olan Death Race 2000'e (1975) dayanır.

Özetle, herhangi bir ölçüye göre bir şaheser değil ama kesinlikle bugün bile oynanmaya değer. Ayrıca, Windows 10'da kusursuz çalışması hayret verici. Modası geçmiş olmasına rağmen, hâlâ bilgisayar oyunları tarihindeki en büyük yarış oyunlarından biri.

Uzun lafın kısası,  bu oyun çok eğlenceli. Biraz tekrar ediyor, ama bu durum o kadar çabuk fark edilmiyor.  Zor bir gün geçirdiyseniz ve biraz stres atmak istiyorsanız, o zaman bu oyun tam size göre. Bu oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ederim. 

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198104954294', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 352, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 683, 'last_played': 1602233326}
review:
[h1]Twisted Metal на минималках[/h1]
Сразу хочу предупредить что я никогда не играл в Тачкапокалипсис а значит могу чего-то не знать не понимать и вообще я тупой ньюфаг.Уяснили?Отлично.
Эпоху DOS я хоть и застал но уже на её закате и не о каких играх на этой платформе я не слыхивал ибо не играл в игры на тот момент.И о Тачкапокалипсисе я узнал когда искал информацию об одной игре с PS 1 в которую я когда-то играл но так и не мог вспомнить её название и тут мне попадается она.Странная кровавая гонка с роком матюками убийствами но без голых сисек.Я загорелся желанием в неё поиграть а после узнал что её считают культовой.Ну всё подумал я.Куплю если есть на пк.И вуаля я перед вами.Ладно хватит предисторий пора и о самой игре поговорить.
По идее это аркадная гонка но по сути смесь аркадной гонки 90 годов и симулятора разрушения и давления прохожих аля GTA.Сами гонки тут скорее прикрытие для давление прохожих.По факту тут нет как таковых мест.Придёте вы хоть первый хоть последний не имеет значения главное успеть в тайминг(Есть таймер и его надо пополнять убийствами) и не умереть.А умирать вы будете часто.(При не осторожной езде.)
Трассы в игре не типичные и не линейные (За исключением самой первой) хотя задача прийти к финишу и не меняется за-то меняется ландшафт и появляются дополнительные сложности вроде полиции.
Графика для своего времени просто огонь да и сейчас смотрится не плохо.
Музыка отвал башки я в какой-то момент словил себя на мысли что я просто сижу в меню и залипаю на музыку.А это дорого стоит.
Геймплей:Скучный и по факту однообразный.Имеет проблемы по части управления физики и дальности прорисовки объектов.Хотя последнее не стоило выводить в минусы геймплея но я не могу молчать уже блять.
Всё заебало DOS мать его BOX вы что издеваетесь?Эта херь крашится чаще чем у разрабов появляется совесть.Вы выкатываете в стим игру а это оказывается хуёвый эмулятор.Вы офигели там?
Фиг с ним с вылетами откуда такой импут лаг то?Просто ад какой-то.
Вывод:Интересно ли в это играть?Сомнительно мне уже после первых 3 карт всё надоело.Давить NPC не самое увлекательное занятие.Удобно ли в это играть?Сомнительно с учётом того что DOSBOX чудит да ещё и импут лаг в подарок выдаёт.Хорошая ли это игра?Да не шедевр не заслуживающая особого внимания.Просто хорошая игра.Поиграть пару часов расслабится не более.

review:
Just like the old days: "Race completed! Every oponent wasted!" :D

-1 To be honest, they could make a remastered version of this game by using OpenGL or D3D by now..

-1 For Cops.. they are annoying like hell because they chase only you, and damn strong..
-1 For the way of unlocking new cars is really hard in the early stages, you just can't do enough damage to unlock any..
-1 For half or more of the cars are uncontrolable, most of them are useless because of that.

+1 For the STYLE, don't need to win the race by racing.. but you may win by destruction. :D

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198092121287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1168, 'last_played': 1601005892}
review:
I grew up playing Twisted Metal, so I knew this would be pretty fun too, and it was. Although it didn't run great, it was still very enjoyable.

Pros:
-This game is not politically correct
-Fun gameplay
-Lots of different characters and maps, between the base game and it's expansion pack

Cons:
-It doesn't run very good. With graphics set to highest options, I average around 20fps on a relatively high end PC
-DOSBox
-Sometimes opening the game results in a black screen
-Trying to use the Steam overlay while playing causes it to stay up. Pressing Shift+Tab about 20 more times may fix it
-No point in Alt+Tabbing, you'll have to close the game; trying to maximize it will result in a black screen
-Trying to quit the game from the menu results in a black screen. Alt+Tab and Task Manager do not bypass it. Easy fix is just signing out by using the Windows key

Overall, it is a fun game. Most of the cons are avoidable after figuring them out. Have fun unlocking the Suppressor.

review: Whilst this game may have been good back when it first launched (I wouldn't know as I didn't play it back then) this version is unplayable. There have been no attempts to make this game run well on modern pc's. It runs in a tiny little box in the middle of the screen and there was no resolution options or other changes that are common in other ports of older titles. As well as this the controls are a mess. Upon loading the game for some unknown reason movements are bound to numbers rather than WASD.  Unless there is some patch I don't know about then Id  say stay well away from this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979953970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 490, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1596204054}
review:
Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

I'll recommend this for the game iself which is great and brings back good memories. I can't, however, recommend this Steam version (it's based on GOG DOSBox). Even though it "works" it is however too limited for nowadays in terms of resolutions and compatibility. I'll recomend installing the Max Pack Restoration Project to be able to choose resolutions (doesn't support widescreen though) and play in windowed mode for example. https://steamcommunity.com/app/282010/discussions/0/611703999981147655/

The game itself is great, the driving physics are weirdly realistic, I remember as a kid just driving through the checkpoints and ignoring the destruction and deathly part of it, only because it was so fun to drive the cars.
