author: {'steamid': '76561199051530128', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 1107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 750, 'last_played': 1686655026}
review:
[h1] Motivos para compar a versão de pc: [/h1]

[list]
[*] Vem com Dosbox pré-configurado
[*] Vem com todas as expansões
[*] Diferente da versão mobile, não tem propagandas
[/list]

[h1] Contras: [/h1]

[list]
[*] Vem com um Dosbox capado, e não roda nativamente no sistema
[*] Não tem suporte a controles mais atuais
[*] Não tem resolução widescreen 
[/list]

[h2] Sugestão: [/h2]

Eu sei que existe o Carmageddon Max Pack, mas seria interessante se a Stainless Games fizesse um remaster utilizando uma engine reimplementada, assim como visto na versão mobile, além do suporte a widescreen e a controles. 

[h3] Considerações finais [/h3]

O conceito do jogo é muito legal, um jogo de corrida e mundo aberto onde você tem mais de uma forma de ganhar a corrida.

[i] Se você deseja jogar com controle, recomendo usar essa configuração que eu fiz: [/i]

steam://controllerconfig/282010/2406534714

author: {'steamid': '76561198180023407', 'num_games_owned': 209, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1128, 'last_played': 1592977254}
review:
Carmageddon doesn't deserve a thumbs down. But just like in my Max Payne review I'm giving it a thumbs down because Stainless Games hasn't fixed there product. Carmageddon works out of the box unlike Max Payne but what it doesn't do is play or look good at all. I highly recommend installing and configuring the "Unofficial Max Pack 95 Restoration Project Pack". I'm not going to walk you through how to configure it since it pretty much says but if you need help feel free to message me if the thread you got the mod from doesn't help. 

Now onto the game itself. Carmageddon is great fun at first but I quickly realized while playing it how little the game mixes itself up. You start with three maps unlocked. Each map that's completed awards you with at least a rank as long as you don't suck and every three ranks you unlock a new map. This already means you're going to have to replay maps over and over again but this wouldn't be an issue if the maps themselves were interesting. Out of the thirty, they all feel like carbon copies of about six unique maps. And a lot of the "new" maps are actual copies. They're the same maps but just with different routes and weather types. Because of this, the game doesn't have any progression. After eliminating opponents there is a chance that they will become playable after the race but the issue with this is that the best car in the game is your own. Besides a change of pace, there's no reason to use the other vehicles. The game does, however, give the player a lot of options. When in-game you have the option of racing, taking down your opponents, or if you're a masochist eliminating all of the pedestrians. This is close to impossible however since levels can have over five hundred of these little time pinatas scattered throughout them. Speaking of, you can lose a map by running out of time. Time is acquired by running over pedestrians or slamming your car into the opposition. The thing is unless you're new to the game you won't be running out of time on any of the difficulties besides the hardest one. So if you love the taste of pain be sure to play the hardest difficulty since you can't change your difficulty on the fly. Since I started the game on medium I'm going to have to either finish it on medium or start the whole game over. The aforementioned ranks are acquired at the end of the map and the number of ranks you move up is proportionate to the number of credits you have. Credits are gained by doing just about everything. Slamming into other cars, running down pedestrians or cows, going through checkpoints, scratching your ass, and so on. These credits are used during the actual game to repair or recover your car. What this means is that sloppy play isn't punished, you just won't be ranking up as fast. But the maps are all carbon copies so why do I care?! See the problem? Carmageddon is a hell of a lot of fun but it feels more like an arcade game then a game you're supposed to binge play for 30 hours. The thing is the key loop of the game is a lot of fun. Finishing off your foes, running over crowds of people, and messing with crazy powerups all are great time wasters. But if the game was way shorter and had actual difficulty it wouldn't just be a time-waster. With just a few tweaks the game could be an adrenaline rush. The problem is it's more of a casual murder simulator than a Twisted Metal rival.

review: Uma versão interessante do jogo original, pelos gráficos no máximo de qualidade possível. Um jogo com físicas excelentes e que diverte pela aleatoriedade da IA. Parece que recalibraram pra melhor os controles. A versão não está configurando os volumes dentro do jogo. Então você é obrigado a ouvir as músicas e os efeitos sonoros o tempo todo. Pra quem gosta de tirar a música pra ouvir outra coisa, ou você tira o som total ou se contente. Um dos melhores jogos de carro que tem até hoje.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996890045', 'num_games_owned': 3060, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1590522429}
review:
Carmageddon Max Pack is a reproduction of the original Carmageddon game, enabling it to be played on computers with Windows XP/Vista/7.

It's a bit of retro fun - just the thing for those who want to relive their old memories of this game - which caused a bit of controversy when it was originally released.

Potential buyers should be aware that, compared to modern car games, Carmageddon is ancient stuff.
If you're after great graphics and superb gameplay, then Carmageddon is not for you.
Just buy it for old time's sake.

As an aside, I had a bit of trouble running it (on Windows 7). It seemed that a Windows graphics prompt was causing it to go awry.
Tried to run it three times, but each time it would go to a black screen, and it wouldn't allow me to exit the game.
Then I found that when I went to close it down via the Windows Task Manager (via Ctrl-Alt-Del), that I could actually play it whilst the Task Manager was running in the background. Nice one.

You can set four separate lots of controls.
However, you can't set the arrow keys (which are used for angle of view).
Nor can you set the S key (it looks like it can be set on the screen; however, it's actually set permanently for "Sound", and won't work in the way you reset it).

Carmageddon Max Pack is really only meant for those who want a bit of computer game nostalgia, so it should only be bought on that basis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070875313', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1590772792}

author: {'steamid': '76561197989290281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 315, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1589658271}
review:
Still a fun and crazy classic, but there are some issues with the controls. Getting a controller to work will require a third party mapping app, and some of the keys are hard coded and cannnot be rebound.

For it's time it's pretty advanced with vehicle weight and speed actually having an effect, as well as different weakspots and strategies needed to eliminate the AI drivers. There is also cockpit views!

It's hard to believe the controversy this game created as it is quite tame by today's standards. However if you ever wanted to see a deathrace 2000 video game - here it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146556786', 'num_games_owned': 451, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1589658330}
review:
И это игроки называют шедевром?
Серией Carmageddon я не был знаком в детстве и познакомился первой частью только сейчас.
На графику нужно сделать  скидку, так как игра 97-года. 
Поговорим об геймплее и идеи. Перед нами обычные гонки 90- годов с идеей, что мы должны сбивать пешеходов и нам должно это типо нравится. но не какого эффекта нет, игра не доставляет удовольствия.
+ прибавьте проблемы этой версии, виде управления на нумпаде и вшитого dosbox.
Вы получаете не играбельную игру не интересной либо устаревшей идеей

author: {'steamid': '76561197993566626', 'num_games_owned': 2325, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1663185913}
review: ВаааХ, Какая же топовая игруха. Особенно первые 2 части, ну Карма оригинальная и Карма Сплэт Пэк! Блэт! ))) Бабульки за сотку кредитов и прочий люд хрустящий под колесами, оставляющие красные следы на асфальте! Круто было и до сих пор круто! Особенно классно в первой части было Выбить 6ти колесный коповый грузовик. Берешь Такой ЭЛЕКТРУ, находишь бочку с бонусом ПЕШЕХОДОВ и мочишь их всех по быстрому на 100%... Красота. ЗА день проходишь игру и развлекаешься уже с 6тиколесником! ))))) Помню батька ДИСК, сборник игрух привез из Болгарии, в 99м году. Мудохался с ним. Квака и Дум отлично ставились и шли, а тут еще опыта было мало! ))) В итоге установил, начал играть, и я захожу в комнату. А на мониторе еще 15 дюймовике кажись, кишки, тела летят от бампера, красота. Тогда сразу влюбился в это детище! )) Отсюда спокойно гоняю по городу ничего не нарушая, не попадаясь и никому не мешая. Так как понималка работает. И это еще до инета по телефону, лично у меня появившегося в 2002м году. Во были времена...

Но честно было тяжело пройти её - физики нет, машина летает, скользит, прыгает, но только не едет как надо, тупейший ИИ. 
5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198049823783', 'num_games_owned': 1712, 'num_reviews': 1265, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1583542422}
review:
Un gran juego de finales de los 90 Traido para PC, se ve y se juega igual que hace 23 años, una pena que el motor de fisica y la conduccion sean demasiado toscos y arcade para mi gusto.

No envejecio muy bien aunque esta bastante aceptable y divertido, cantidad decente de carreras, autos y partes, podes ganar dando las vueltas (lo mas facil) - chocar y destruir a tus competidores (mediano) o atropellando a todas las personas del juego (dificil), tambien hay bonus de objetos rompiendo barriles y demas que dan mas tiempo, dinero o powerups temporales, como por ejemplo escalar por las paredes, baja gravedad, etc.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079187939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 348, 'playtime_forever': 1248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1679315439}
review:
Fantastische demolition/road kill racer ! Toen in 1997 en vandaag de dag even leuk en knap in elkaar gestoken tracks. De beste Carmageddon ever !
Wel opletten als je in 1920x1080 wil spelen en je hebt maar een i3-2120 (jaja die gamers bestaan ook nog) dan is het best dat je in de map gaat van Carmageddon onder dosbox. Daar start je even nglide_config op om de resolutie op bvb 1280x720 (of 1024x600 wat nog beter is qua performance) te zetten, je zal zien dat het beter speelt. Dat is te wijten omdat dit een oud spel is en geprogrammeerd voor de PC's van toen.

Voor de prijs, zeker in sales, moet je deze game in huis hebben (of je hebt een hekel aan racers of je bent een moraalridder tsja dan is het niets voor jou :)
De rest met gezond verstand en toch een beetje knettergek: kopen, hit the pedal to the metal and crush them all !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021789615', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1568481244}
review:
[i]-Вы знаете? Мы довольно скептически относились к различным предсказателям будущего. До тех пор, пока не убедились, что их пророчество содержит зерно истины.
-Многие ясновидцы неоднократно предсказывали скорый армагеддон, и что же? Он действительно вот-вот появится. На прилавках и под ними.
-Игра Кармагеддон продолжит нашу программу.
...
-Кровищи-то?
-Нет, пока крови нет, но скоро будет, не сомневайтесь. Кармагеддон - это жестокие гонки на выживание. Правила состязания не обуздывают кровожадность водителей, а поощряют её. Многие уже давно заметили к чему идёт дело.
-Братья, пешеходы, вы видите, что с каждым годом они всё не охотнее пользуются тормозом, и всё свирепей жмут на газ? Мы с вами чувствуем это, когда переходим улицу. Пока они ещё останавливаются, но всё ближе к нашим беззащитным ногам. А эти новые машины? А моторы? А колёса? ВСЕ НА СТРОИТЕЛЬСТВО ПОДЗЕМНЫХ ПЕРЕХОДОВ!
-Победы в игре можно добиться тремя способами. Во-первых, первым прийти к финишу. 
-Ну, гонки всё-таки! 
-Во-вторых, уничтожить машины соперников. 
-Ну, это тоже понятно. Если ты на трассе один, тебе и быть победителем. 
-Третий способ, довольно странный. Нужно передавить всех пешеходов и призовое место автоматически достанется вам. 
-Я же говорил!
-Автомобили могут делать много такого, чего обычные машины стараются не совершать. Они могут переворачиваться, деформироваться, гореть и разваливаться на мелкие кусочки. В игре 30 различных трасс и 60 транспортных средств, начиная от БМП и заканчивая лимузином из бюро ритуальных услуг. Кстати, водитель последнего, мог бы неплохо зарабатывать просто следуя за колонной и подбирая останки клиентов.
-Кармагеддон, входит в десятку игр проклятых государственной автоинспекцией.[/i]

[b]От винта, выпуск №49[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198045009057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1673034829}
review:
It's old but *very* playable. I recommend using the 3dfx mode as it delivers cleaner graphics. Also the keyboard combo of a-z-alt for your car's driving mode works well. In this version, the "people" are real people and when you run them over, red can be seen. Back in the day, there was an outcry, "it's terrible", "why run over people", etc., so the programmers changed the blood to green, so they were aliens posing as humans, or something. 

Either way, worth your time if at least for the first 6 or so races.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962829908', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1568189863}
review:
IMO this is one of the greatest games of all time, i couldnt tell you how many hours ive spent cruising around in it and smashing up peds.

I think Carmageddon was one of, if not, the first driving games that allowed you to go off the track to find your own way or just explore instead of trying for the best time or position in the race.
The car physics and damage model were top of the line for its time and the driving physics are still very good.
Environments look great of the tech available at that time.
The tone of the game is dark but highly humorous and that has rubbed off on me for life, i was into cheesy action flicks at the time of the release, after it i found i highly enjoyed b-level splatter, sci-fi and horror as well.

The music in the game is amazing, probably the most memorable soundtrack for me, i used to pop the game cd in my stereo, skip the data track and listen to the music when doing other thing.
When MP3s became i thing i always had instrumental versions of the Fear Factory albums off which the soundtrack is taken in my playlists.

This dosbox port runs the 3dfx version so you get higher resolution and 3d acceleration for higher quality graphics, looks very good on my tv from the couch where im sitting, runs way better than it did on my 60mhz pentium with 12mb of ram i initially played it on :P

It might not be as interesting for someone that has not got the nostalgic connection to it but i still think it should offer a good laugh.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167851808', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1567894678}
review: Carmageddon is an amazing game and I would love to be able to play it again. I thought this would have been an updated version to run on modern machines but it seems to just be the original attempting to run in dosbox and it runs so poorly its unplayable, at least on windows 10. I should have read the description better but I was so excited it was on here I didn't bother. If someone would make an HD rerelease of this that ran decent and maybe smooth out the textures some I'd easily pay 50-60 bucks for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153150351', 'num_games_owned': 2413, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 938, 'last_played': 1606064248}
review:
fragmenty mojej recenzji z independent zin:

"Czym w ogóle jest Carmageddon? Tutaj właściwe będzie cofnięcie się do pewnego filmu, jeszcze z lat 70, o tytule Death Race 2000. Wystąpili w nim Sylvester Stallone (Rocky, Rambo etc) i David Carradine (Bill z Kill Bill). Przedstawiał on brutalne wyścigi samochodów w dystopijnej przyszłości, gdzie dodatkowe, często kluczowe dla zwycięstwa punkty zdobywało się za przejeżdżanie każdej osoby, która nawinęła się pod koła, czasem też występowała krwawa rywalizacja między zawodnikami (...) I o tym mniej więcej jest Carmageddon - w swoim czasie jedna z najbardziej kontrowersyjnych serii gier, na równi z postalem. Zasady są proste - bierzesz udział w wyścigu, w którym możesz demolować przeciwników, a także polować na mieszkańców. (...)
Poza przeciwnikami istotną rolę odgrywają biegające po mapie ofia.. ekhm... mieszkańcy miast. Przede wszystkim, da się ich, co oczywiste, rozjeżdżać ;) Ba, ludzie to element dość ważny dla gameplayu, bo każdy rozjechany osobnik dla gracza równy jest dodatkowym punktom i sekundom na liczniku. (...)
Pierwszą część Carmageddona uwielbiam, chociaż IMO wydana po roku dwójka znacznie ją przebiła.(...)"

więcej tutaj:
https://issuu.com/independentzin/docs/independent_zin_02

author: {'steamid': '76561198837709357', 'num_games_owned': 575, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1550361705}
review:
[h1]Road raging at its finest![/h1]

Ever got so fed up with traffic in real life that you sometimes wished you could just put the pedal to the metal and plow through the whole lot? Well...  now you can ;)

However... keep in mind that this review is about the original DOS game now going back an easy [i]20 [u]years[/u][/i] ago, so if you're new to the series you may also want to look into a more modern release such as the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/505170/Carmageddon_Max_Damage/]2016 Max Damage release[/url].

[h1]Total carnage awaits...[/h1]

The setup is simple: there's a race between several "VMD's" ("Vehicles of Mass Destruction", lol!) and you're one of the contestants. While you could start racing and going through all the checkpoints like a good sports...  who'd want to do that? Nah, instead of finishing first why not make sure that the others won't be able to finish [b]at all[/b]?

You're in a massive map which has tons of things to explore and secret passages to find, there are a load of pedestrians on the streets but you can do something about that as well. And as for the other cars... either smash into them and watch as their bodywork slowly begins to crumble and smoke. Or maybe try to pick up one of the many powerups and try to destroy your opponents that way.

This thing has "road rage" written all over it and it does an amazing job too!

Of course... this game is not for the faint of heart, because the things you're going to do to the cows which are also in the game?  Just horrible I tell you!  ;)   (the only animals in the game are cows which can also be run over).

[h1]In conclusion...[/h1]

I was very surprised to discover that Steam still carried the original DOS game(s) so I immediately picked up on them. These days there are more games which allow you to do a bit of road raging, sure, but nothing beats the original I think!

author: {'steamid': '76561198079795608', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1689687289}
review:
A blast from the past.
Everything about this game is kinda off.
Everything is with it's flaws.
But with all it's weaknesses it offers great fun.

The obvious fun is in the trailer: Some rather wide arena with cars you can either beat by being fastest (which happens every 25th race or so because you actually wanted to see it happen), or by killing every last one of the others by destruction derby. Additionally there is a timer. You don't get time for reaching checkpoints, you get time for driving over people, cattle or anything else that doesn't move out of the way fast enough. The inherent brutality is a huge selling point here.

It has strange physics, that make you fly around for no reason. But, a well hit high speed crash really feels heavy too.
The vehicle feels light, is easy to oversteer (which would suggest a very heavy vehicle) and then snaps into spinning. Not oversteer, just spinning. It's recommendable to break, then go for the run in handbrake. High speed cornering just doesn't happen. There is a chance to find ways up rooftops and such, just to fall down again. There are pickups that offer some weird effects (like wall climbing, jelly suspension that makes your car undrivable and such) but they are more gimmick than mechanically important.

I always had huge fun with the game, because it really turns bonkers up to eleven. It's unapologetically stupid and raw. Including it's awful design flaws. But that makes it's charm as well. I will always love that game for what it offers. It's sort of a guilty pleasure. The portrait of you, the driver is a hilarious idea as well. These sort of characters in racing games (Slipstream 5000 had that too) totally got lost in the nineties. Well. Really stupid fun. If you look at it expecting a good game, stay away, it has far too many flaws. If you can't wait to hear Anna screaming in fear because you go 300mph while closing in on a solid wall ...then well. Give it a shot. The "Uwaaaah" and "Eeeeeeeh" will always be in my memories. As well as the many sounds for crashing and the many undrivable cars. I just love this mess of a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988758568', 'num_games_owned': 835, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1576679121}
review:
Awesome rather, simple game.

You drive around and follow this sort of competition that has you racing over rooftops (yeah you heard that right), among other sort of open world racing and it will have you doing doing all kind of unconventional stuff to gain snippets of time, as for the timer not to run out.

Oh, did I mention what happens if the timer runs out?

[spoiler]You lose.[/spoiler]

Great, somewhat simplistic (but fun) game from the time when a lot of unique surprises came rolling along.

[spoiler]This still happens, [i]today[/i].[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198059679414', 'num_games_owned': 1467, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 2106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 726, 'last_played': 1708259122}
review:
По сути тут две игры. Carmageddon и Carmageddon Splat Pack. Различие между ними весьма серьёзные. В Carmageddon Splat Pack абсолютно новые трассы, есть новые машины (старые тачки имеют слегка иной вид, но не все).
Лёгкий уровень сложности - гоняй в своё удовольствие. Враги рассыпаются с пол пинка, времени дают со всех и в большом количестве. 
Средний уровень сложности - напряжение не сильное, но ограничение по времени иногда поджимает (особенно под финал игры). Времени дают со всех, но не слишком много. Враги в меру агрессивные и достаточно крепкие. 
Хардкор - Идите на фиг! Я не сунусь в этот кошмар! Таймер жмёт, с врагов времени дают мало, животных и людей можешь не давить (на харде это тупо бесполезно). Враги крепкие, как Арни в свои лучшие годы. Ты хотел челлендж? Пройди эту игру на харде и без читов. На старте всё будет нормально. А вот с середины игра тебе скажет: - "Добро пожаловать в ад!"

author: {'steamid': '76561198000722022', 'num_games_owned': 4291, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1554908336}

author: {'steamid': '76561198063230655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1525416887}
review:
Los verdaderos estallidos puramente arcade, sangrientos e inmorales, Carmageddon es una dosis de diversión concentrada. Si algunos lo culpan por esta violencia gratuita, a los otros les tomará horas de placer caminar por los muchos circuitos al volante de sus autos, todo lo que es más basura que los otros por las carreras violentas, rápidas e intensas. ¿Un juego que no perdemos fácilmente, excepto para jugar después?
;-p

author: {'steamid': '76561198046371804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1547271095}
review:
Эта 1 часть Кармагеддона - наиболее "правильная" версия из трех классических. В том плане, что здесь игрок занимается в первую очередь разрушением оппонентов и погонями за пешеходами, и никто ему не мешает это делать.
Во 2 части добавили спорные миссии с заездами на время. Хотя в обычных гонках по-прежнему весело и кроваво.
В TDR уже даже в обычной гонке особо не покрошишь оппонентов и зомби. Игра словно вынуждает заниматься чекпойнтами. Игра все равно интересная, но уже не тот зубодробительный Кармагеддон.

Итак, эта первая часть - тот самый чистокровный, концентрированный Кармагеддон. Однозначно лучшая из всей серии (в новую современную еще не играл).
Вроде бы все хорошо и стимовская версия по умолчанию использует DosBox, отлично работает даже на Windows 10.
Но... При этом умудряется тормозить... Если включен вид из кабины - фпс запросто может падать до малоиграбельных значений.
Вроде где-то в обсуждениях есть частичное решение проблемы, но я уже удалил игру и проверять лень.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092405102', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1543776388}
review: Prostate

author: {'steamid': '76561198026690197', 'num_games_owned': 279, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1667199026}
review:
Неиграбельно в 2018 году. Игру выключил спустя 13 минут после запуска. 
Кривое управление на Нумпаде, звук пропадает. Про разрешение не буду говорить, это будет нечестно к разработчикам из 1997 года.
Игра вам надоест, не тратьте деньги даже по 50 процентной скидке. Участвуйте в раздачах либо ждите более мощных скидок. Потому что смысл покупки только в карточках или коллекции игр.
Что бы вы понимали, я не против поиграть в ретро игры. Я до сих пор во втором Максе Пейне пытаюсь побить собственные рекорды и достижения. Я не против поиграть в инди игры, например подсел на маленькую но замечательную Spectra. Carmageddon Max Pack наверное должен был вызвать у меня чувство ностальгии, но больше ностальгии у меня вызывают Дальнобойщики 3 нежели это…
Для 1997 года это был прорыв, крутая физика. Куча жесткого экшена. Я серьезно получил хорошие впечатления после того как Макс Дэмэдж въехал на стадион. Ууух.
Для 2018 года… В тетрисе смысла больше, да в тетрисе текстуры гораздо раньше подгружаются чем в Carmageddon Max Pack.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198026108348', 'num_games_owned': 699, 'num_reviews': 349, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1540879830}
review:
Кармаш это просто легенда. Мы, бородатые неандертальцы, попробовали этот пиксельный адреналиновый ад ещё в ранние школьные годы. С ним было связано много скандалов, и его обожали абсолютно все. 
 Но сейчас, не смотря на то, что, игра продаётся в Стим, играть в неё просто технически тяжко. Прорисовка слишком не далека, ты не видишь дорогу дальше вытянутой руки. Управление просто дубовое. А сама игра запускается....на встроенным DosBox. Игра все так же крута,и по началу вызывает ретро восторг, но в таком виде, играть в неё просто сложно для глаз. Так что версия на PS1 или ремейк вам в помощь. А эту версию, не рекомендую, только из за технического аспекта

author: {'steamid': '76561198194094842', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2109, 'last_played': 1514499869}
review:
El viejo y querido clásico violento Carmageddon vuelve en Steam adaptado para sistemas modernos y sin retoques que saquen la emoción que generaba este juego en su época.
Por ahí no le doy un 10/10 por el tema del emulador, DosBox es medio mierda y hasta en una PC con un i7 (notese que DosBox no usa GPU) te corre los juegos en -30fps. Pero bueno, es jugable y te sentís de vuelta como cuando recién salió en su época.
Una masa, yendo a lo factible del juego, si te gustan los juegos de carreras, matar gente, autos llenos de cuchillas, raros, la sangre, recorrer mapas libremente y sos un depravado mental, este es un juego para vos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028865651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1109, 'last_played': 1480087999}

review:
3 façons de gagner :
Faire la course
Démolir tous les adversaires
Ecraser tous les piétons

C'est simple et efficace.

Seul petit reproche, la maniabilité.
Elle semblait très bonne quand il est sorti (comparé à un jeu d'arcade, Carmageddon était presque de la simulation)
Maintenant, on constate tous les défauts. Heureusement, ça fait aussi parti de son charme.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962876566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3555, 'last_played': 1510250041}
review:
English developer Stainless Software's "antidote to racing games" was originally intended to be a demolition derby type of game. Both the Mad Max and Death Race 2000 licenses were considered, but fell through, and what emerged from that was Carmageddon. 

Breaking from British racing game tradition, Carmageddon isn't about finishing first. I don't even think the opponents can actually finish the race at all. They just drive around, crashing into each other. It's more like Twisted Metal, but without weaponry. Each stage is set in a sandbox-type level filled with hundreds of pedestrians and a few armoured police vehicles. There are three ways to complete a stage. Either you do all the laps, but like I mentioned you get no competition from the opponents; you destroy your opponents by crashing into them, which can be a little tricky at times because it seems like you have to hit them at the right angle to do damage; or you run down and kill all the pedestrians, which can take quite a while. 

To progress in the game you have to increase your rank. You start at number 99 and have to work your way up to number 1 to unlock the last stage. In order to increase your rank you have to get a certain amount of credits on each stage, depending on which difficulty you're playing on. You get credits for running people over, crashing into your opponents, going through checkpoints, etc. You lose credits if you reset or repair your car, which is done by the press of a button while driving. The car kind of buckles out like in the John Carpenter film Christine, which is cool. There's a time limit on each race, which at first may seem kind of low, but you easily gain time in the same way you gain credits, except you won't get any time for actually racing. 

Controlling your car in Carmageddon isn't the easiest thing to do. I can't really think of a game with similar steering. When you're driving slowly you have decent control, but when you get up to speed and try to turn it's like the car understeers, or a slight turn could make you lose grip and spin out. I usually use the handbrake for cornering, drifting tens of meters completely sideways before gaining traction again. It could be that the lower than normal gravity impacts the steering. At least it effects the way you jump, which is quite cool and makes the game more unique. It's sort of like racing on the Moon. 

The game's biggest draw is being able to run people down and being awarded for it. It's not a very challenging game, but it's a relaxing one where you can just sit back and have fun. If you destroy your opponents cars you sometimes unlock them and can use them yourself. They all have a unique cockpit view, if you're into first person racing. Some of them have better steering, some are more powerful, and some are faster, especially a drag racing car which goes insanely fast but can barely steer. My favorite car is the one you start with, because it's the most balanced one, plus it's modelled after David Carradine's car in Death Race 2000. 

There's a handful of locations in the game, from the big city to the coast, a chemical plant, a winter resort, etc. You'll have to revisit these places a number of times, racing different routes. This gets a bit repetitious because the routes often cross previous routes, and if you drive around trying to destroy your opponents or kill pedestrians, it's basically just like playing the same stages over and over again, considering they take place in the same sandboxes. The game is a little too long for its own good, but if you play it a little here and there instead of plowing through it in a couple of seatings, it's great fun!

----------

Carmageddon Splat Pack, which is also included in the Max Pack, is an expansion for the original Carmageddon, containing a bunch of new levels and a number of new cars. There are new pedestrians as well, and some new power-ups, but since the levels are the main thing I'll give some short comments on those. 

Mayan Magnificence Hotels: Set in a Central or South American hotel resort with architecture resembling the ancient local civilizations. Well-designed map that is fun to play. 

MagnaChem Rural Developments Inc.: Rocky and green prison island surrounded by mountains. Not that exciting. Lots of fluffy sheep though. 

MagnaChem Abandoned Ice Station: Snowy industrial roads with gaps you have to jump every now and again. Nothing special. 

Craggy Isle Dam Complex: This map consists of two islands: one is bright and colorful, with palm trees and a small nice town, and the other is dull and gray, with a boring dam in the middle. 

MagnaChem Environmental Disaster: Kind of lackluster. A bunch of high bridges binding together a bunch of small dusty islands. 

Nerdberksring Race Circuit: Actually a proper race track. Adds some variation to the mayhem, but it would be nice if the level had some stunt jumps as well. 

Musty Ramparts Theme Castle: A large medieval castle filled with hallways. Good for smashing into the other cars. There's also a gravel road that goes through a decently sized outdoor area. 

And last but not least, and possibly spoiler alert since you only get to play this map at the very end: 
Hell: A big and confusing map that takes place in the underworld, complete with a graveyard, lava pits and burning demons, a flaming bar, Eskimos on ice, and the Devil himself. Takes some time to learn, but once you know how to get around the level is pretty fun. 

----------

This release isn't exactly remastered, but I could get it to play fine in 1920x1080. It runs through DOSBox and works fairly well. I'll give it a solid 3 out of 5 car crashes!

review:
El original Carmageddon, correr, atropellar personas, destruccion y caos en la cuidad.
La splatcam(camara del conductor) lo hace mas divertido con las expreciones de Max Damage y Die Anna.
Tiene potenciadores, poderes y de mas para que la diversion del caos nunca termine.
100% recomendable para comenzar a jugar esta franquicia.
Parra ser un juego auntiguo vale la pena, eso si, esta emulado en Dos-Box, asi que cuidado con los requerimientos de tu pc, pueden afectar los fps.
Puntuacion: 9.8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197987722190', 'num_games_owned': 378, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 1766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1717, 'last_played': 1691862592}
review:
Carmageddon... Le top du top en matière de controverse à sa sortie en 1997. Ce jeu de course, ou plutôt de combat motorisé, a construit sa notoriété sur la possibilité de rouler sur les piétons avec moult effets gores à la clé. Fort heureusement, le titre a plus à offrir qu'une collection de sprites sanguinolents. Il y a d'abord la conduite très spéciale : les véhicules sont lourds et réagissent logiquement à tous les impacts tandis que la gravité du jeu est très faible. Un curieux mélange qui donne à la fois des sensations réalistes mais engendre aussi des cascades démentes. il y a également la gestion des dégâts : la voiture se déforme en fonction des chocs subis et reprend gracieusement sa forme d'origine sur demande. Une petite prouesse technique pour l'époque. Si on ne peut pas parler de monde ouvert, on a clairement droit à un gameplay sandbox puisqu'il est possible d'explorer comme bon nous semble les environnements. Chaque course peut être terminée de trois manières : soit en finissant le nombre de tours imposé, soit en éliminant tous les concurrents soit en écrabouillant tous les piétons du coin. Si les deux premières options sont viables, la troisième est réservée aux vrais psychopathes compte tenu du nombre élevé de piétons dans chaque lieu et de la difficulté de tous les atteindre. Cette version 'Max Pack' comprend également le Splat Pack, l'extension officielle du jeu. Celle-ci ajoute une quantité respectable de contenu avec de nouveaux véhicules, circuits, piétons et même une nouvelle bande-son ; quasiment un second jeu en termes de durée de vie.
Alors faut-il jouer à Carmageddon de nos jours ? Si on n'y a jamais touché, non. Les graphismes piquent les yeux et il y a de toutes façons la version Max Damage de 2015 pour découvrir la série. Si on y a joué à l'époque, la nostalgie et le gameplay bourrin feront très certainement effet !

author: {'steamid': '76561198070712973', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1504280041}
review:
Make sure to download the Win95RPP pack and use something like xpadder to hook up your gamepad - and quite frankly I think Carmageddon gives racing games released in 2017 a run for their money.

- Great art style
- Great music
- Actual driving physics
- Varied vehicles
- Varied tracks
- Vehicle damage
- Open world style gameplay with places to explore

The live-action reaction portrait is something that every game needs. I'm not sure why this died out with Doom and Carmageddon :(

Honestly once you have the high res and gamepad up and running Devolver Digital could release this today and it'd be a hit - it's not just a nostalgia trip.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033757873', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1572884667}
review:
Carmageddon - игра от Stainless Games, взорвавшая мозг всех, кто играл в нее в свое время. Игра вышла в 1997 году, для игровой индустрии этот год был одним из самых бурлящих.

[h1]Сюжет[/h1]

Вы гонщик и вам нужно победить во всех гонках. Еее!!!

[h1]Геймплей[/h1]

Вам необходимо пройти все гонки, для победы в каждой необходимо прийти первым, уничтожить всех соперников или задавить всех  пешеходов на уровне. Если первые два способа довольно просты и доставляют больше всего, то третий - невыносимо нудное и скучное занятие для настоящих задротов, ибо на каждой карте в среднем по 400 пешеходов. По самой трассе разбросаны различные бонусы, они как могут помочь, так и могут навредить: одни дают деньги, время; вторые улучшают скорость авто, третие же просто откидывают через всю карту со скоростью, вплоть до световой. Игрок имеет возможность менять автомобили и прокачивать их, используя деньги, которые получает за выигрыш и разные действия в самой гонке. Также во время гонки можно чинить авто и восстанавливаться (респауниться инными словами, но это не починит вспыхнувший мотор, к примеру). В отличие от многих гоночных игр того времени, Carmageddon вызывал у игрока разрыв шаблона своей динамичностью и драйвом. Ни в одной гонке нельзя было нагло лишать своих соперников железного коня, наматывать кишки пешеходов [spoiler]или коров[/spoiler] на колеса, или, например, поездить по стенам для добычи бочки с баблом; Большинство лишь предлагало амбициозную 3D перспективу и возможность рулить до финиша. В нашем же случае, свобода действий неограничена, ведь Carmageddon - гонки без правил. Как утверждают сами разработчики кстати, им надоели обычные гонки, им захотелось большего, как и многим нам. Говоря про новаторство, им стал сам жанр, а вот бить автомобили и выбирать их можно как минимум в Chase H.Q.

Да что ты знаешь о Carmageddon'е? То что это обычная гоночка без правил? Да в Carmageddon'е каждый игрок становится бесчувственным маньяком, давя всех и вся, что видит на собственном экране. Доставляет даже курсор меню в виде оторванной руки с неиссекаемым количеством вытекающей из нее крови. Все что останется от коров или людей - кровавая каша. Мешают соперники или полицейские? В чем проблема их отправить к остальным в мир инной?

[h1]Геймдизайн[/h1]

Сногсшибательные уровни, пропитанные адреналином и напряженной атмосферой. Тут вам и мертвая петля [spoiler](для второго уровня весьма неплохо, так ведь?)[/spoiler], и кислота, и еще много всякого доставляющего НЁХа. Море экшена и драйва не только при пролете над пропастью, но и при обыкновенным погружением под воду. Все это сопровождается отличным звуком и музыкой.

[h1]Графика и звук[/h1]

Взрыв шаблона возникает и от этих двух штукенций: помимо великолепного геймплея доставляет музыка, звуки, эффекты и сама графика. Претензий нет.

[h1]Релизы на других платформах и издания[/h1]

Android и iOS издания имеют улучшенное меню, также есть возможность доната в обмен на открытые тачки и трассы, слегка улучшена детализация текстур. Издание на Sony Playstation не отличается от версии на PC. В Steam-версии Carmageddon имеет подпись Max Pack - издание с оригинальной игрой и дополнением - Splat Pack, включающий новые уровни и автомобили; изначально Splat Pack выпускался как отдельная игра, под которую была сделанна даже [url=http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/carmageddon/images/a/a6/Carmasplatboxuk.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151020173008]отдельная обложка[/url].

[h1]Также:[/h1]

Игра дается бесплатно вместе с Carmageddon: Max Damage. Есть мультиплеер (не в курсе по поводу его жизнедеятельности), коллекционные карточки. Эмуляция воспроизводится через DOSbox, и весьма нормально. Игра вполне играбельна на новых PC.

[b]Итог:[/b] ИМХО, одна из лучших игр на PC и Sony Playstation, мастхэв, мастплэйд. Ну же, размажь уже кого-нибудь по стенам, будь-то пешехода, будь-то машину!

Оценка: 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080028990', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1696487927}
review:
When I'd first gotten Carmageddon back in the day, I'd gotten just the CD, no manual or instructions, so I didn't know what sort of game it was. I think I was familiar with the idea of racing games with weapons, but I'd always thought that racing was an important part of it.

In Carmageddon, racing is probably the least important part of the game.

The first time I tried it out, I tried running through the checkpoints. Even then, I was aware of how bad I am at games, and wondered at how I'd managed to leave everyone behind. But I kept losing the race because I'd run out of time. Why wasn't I getting time for going through the checkpoints? Was I missing any shortcuts?

Then I tried it again, and went off the track...

Carmageddon was advertised as a "vehicular combat game". There are three ways to win a race. You could try and run through the checkpoints, but you'd still have to find a way to build up enough time to do so. You could fight and "waste" your opponents (by ramming into them, or ramming them into something; no ranged weapons here), or by killing each and every one of the hundreds of pedestrians on the map.

It's quite clear what the game expected you to do.

You gain time by running over pedestrians, damaging and killing your opponents, or running over green barrels scattered (and hidden) off the track. There are various power-ups, also in different coloured-barrels, which range from the very useful (solid granite car, electro-bastard ray), to the weird (instant handbrake, giant pedestrians) to the terrible-but-in-a-fun-way (bounce-bounce, jelly suspension). You can repair your car at any time, but it costs you money, money which you'd earned by running through checkpoints, killing pedestrians, killing opponents, or doing weird things like flipping your car several times off of track geometry (cunning stunt bonus).

Money can be used between races to upgrade your car in three areas, offence, defence and speed. I think that the upgrades apply to all of the cars in your garage, but I'm not entirely sure. To be honest, I'm still not sure how cars were unlocked. Every once in a while, a car that you wasted will become unlocked for you to race around in, but I'm pretty sure it was random. Not every car is unlockable, so no Countslash, no De'Gory'Un. Sorry. In later games, you could buy them out, but here you just get them randomly, and it's only a small portion of them.

You start out with a choice between two cars and drivers, Max Damage with his Eagle, and Di Anna with her Hawk, cars which look similar, but had different stats and different engine placements. Di Anna, I felt, had an unfair advantage, because you'd have less to repair after every crash since her engine was well out of the way during the various head-on collisions you'd go through.

The music is by, according to the wiki, Fear Factory, which explains why it sounded so familiar. No lyrics, but it is loud and heavy. 

It still looks pretty good for a DOS game. Yes, this game is in DOS, and Steam runs it in DOSbox. It runs very smoothly, even (or rather, especially) the 3DFX version. You wouldn't think you were running a 20-year-old game. The damage-model is especially nice, with different areas of the car deforming from impacts and crashes.

I wonder why all of my favourite games were open world and had extensive damage models? Something to think about...

The feel of the car isn't very racing game-ish. Modern racing games are very sensitive about grip and drifting, but Carmageddon is a bit... floatier? Not sure if that's right. The cars will skid around, and different surfaces will be treated differently, but it really isn't a racing game. It's not bad, but after something like Mantis Burn Racing (or even Gas Guzzler Extreme), you can tell that this isn't a hardcore racer.

I got Carmageddon Max Pack free when I bought Carmageddon Max Damage. It's still downloading, so I thought I'd give this old thing a whirl. It holds up pretty well, I'm just not sure if you should buy it. I got it for free, so I'm happy, though I'm not sure if I'll play it if I have the newer, prettier version around. I got them both for USD 5.00, and I'm surprised that this bundle wasn't advertised more heavily.

Download it for your tablet or mini-PC, Carmageddon is a part of gaming history. Just don't pay too much for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024707261', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1502733383}
review:
Certains diront "ce jeu est moche" ; non , il a 20 ans ...
D'autres diront : ce jeu laggue par moment ; c'est mal foutu. Non , il laggait il y a 20 ans sur les pc de l'epoque  ; il envoyait du paté pour l'époque.

Alors oui, si on est habitués aux jeux AAA du 21eme siecle , cinematique à tout va , ce jeu ne vous plaira peut etre pas. 
Mais si vous aimez les "oldies", les jeux au gameplay déjanté (qui a dit que c'etait une simulation de course? c'est du carnage en règle et la foule en délire participe ^^) , le defouloir ancienne époque et qui change d'un duke ou d'un doom , alors tentez l'expérience :).

Avant, les vaches aimaient regarder les voitures passer pied au plancher. Mais çà , c'était AVANT :D !

author: {'steamid': '76561198125240369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1501886546}
review:
Nostalgie ten top! Helaas ook nostalgie naar de problemen die ik met mijn Windows2000Pro Pc had. Nu op Windows10 64bit: De game reageert niet op besturingscontrols, vervolgens reageert de hele game niet meer. de 3DFX versie komt nieteens voorbij het introfilmpje.

Ik denk dat als je een wat oudere PC hebt, je hier wel wat lol aan kan beleven. Maar ik vrees dat de modernere systemen gewoon té nieuw zijn voor deze software van 20 jaar oud.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027973295', 'num_games_owned': 1826, 'num_reviews': 1850, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1501549490}
review:
Carmageddon — это культовая игра, которая во многом определила развитие сразу нескольких жанров. Я практически уверен, что она оказала влияние на GTA. Но сейчас не об этом.

Играя в Carmageddon Max Pack, прекрасно понимаешь, насколько сильно этой игре нужен ремейк. Steam-версия не содержит никакого благородства. Это просто оригинальная версия игры, которая запустится у вас на Windows 7 во встроенном DOSBox и не более того.

В таком виде Carmageddon рекомендована к покупке только бородатым олдфагам и изучающим историю видеоигр. Потому что игра безбожно устарела за прошедшие 20 лет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108235797', 'num_games_owned': 4082, 'num_reviews': 550, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1572052303}
review:
You know you want this, it's one of the greatest game of the 90's, for a game of that time, it sure is beautiful, Hell, it's better looking than most of nowadays video games, no blur, no depth of field, no other bullcrap that "hides" the uglyness of nowadays games.
Pretty great game overall, still worth playing despise the release of Max Damage, first-person driving is better and better looking than in the new one to be honest, driving is overall better but only by a bit (in my opinion), music is great,  what pains me in the new one is that you can't see your dude and his facial expressions, that is such a good addition in my opinion.

Anyway, I suggest it to anyone who likes carnage, adrenaline, Destruction Derby (game), Death Rally (game), Twisted Metal, Mad Max, Interstate 76 (game), Motor Mayhem (game) and perhaps FlatOut. They kind of share some similiarties between each of them.
If you like adrenaline games such as Unreal Tournament, Quake or Duke Nukem, you may like this if it doesn't bother you to play using cars, and well, perhaps Postal 2? Same kind of mayhem but with cars instead, difference is, this game is pure quality.


Fu** yeah!/10   (9.5/.10)

author: {'steamid': '76561198344714295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1544322800}
review:
In my opinion, this game is great for those looking for a fun racing game and or some 1990's nostalgia.

The gameplay is extremely fun, especially when you start picking up power-ups like "Acme Damage Magnifier," which increases the damage you do to other cars, and "Solid Granite Car" which does exactly what it sounds like.

A major downside is that, to my current knowledge, there is no free play mode, unlike in Reincarnation and Max Damage. So you can't say "I want to have nearly unlimited time and credits for this race!" or something like that.

The vehicles are quite an interesting bunch. There's sports cars, trucks, racing cars, hearses and dune buggies, just to name a few. You can unlock some of these vehicles by wrecking them when they are "Stealworthy," although the game doesn't tell you when they are, or, at least not in my play time. Not all vehicles are playable, though. Each vehicle has a damage model.

The physics lean on the side of realistic, opposed to arcadey.

The damage modeling is hugely advanced for 1997. Some games today don't match up. A major downside is that no parts come off of the car and, sometimes, the car will start to "tear apart" and have transparent patches.

The vehicle modeling is slightly below average, the car bodies are good but the wheels are blocky. The windows on all vehicles are chromatic, so you cannot see inside. There is an interior view option, but the interior appears to just be a .GIF of the dashboard, pictured inside of the vehicles.

The pedestrians, which are the, pun intended, meat and bone of the Carmageddon series, are bitmap sprites. The animation is pretty good all things considered. If you hit a pedestrian, they explode into a pile of pixelated gore.

The graphics are average for 1997. Draw distance is a bit close due to the size of the maps.

This game is a tricky if you aren't absolutely amazing at racing games. The opponents basically have the mindset of every Grand Theft Auto Online player ever. There are police in big trucks, too, and they compound this. The game also does not give you much time...You start with 1:30 on the clock. If it reaches 0, you lose. Hitting pedestrians, smashing opponents at speed and doing cool stunts gets you more time.

The soundtrack is small, but good. It features three Fear Factory songs as well as a few 90s-tacular electronica songs.

This game takes some grinding to get through, unless you rack up the credits like a madman. You can gain credits through the same ways as gaining time, as well as going through checkpoints.

There is no traffic to my knowledge, just scattered parked and junked cars.

The level design is...Well, I haven't really fiddled around enough with racing through the levels to tell you. The maps are decently sized, though.

The controls are a bit silly to me. But, then again, I rarely play PC games.

The heads up display is lackluster. You have to push a button to bring up the map. Camera is slow to rotate outside of the car, and only shows one of three directions in the interior view. One of the game's gimmicks is the "Prat Cam," where there is a .GIF of your selected player model reacting to how horrible your driving is.

Overall, if you can take the mental trousers A.I. and playing the same fun levels over and over again, I absolutely recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022104383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1493388483}
review:
Ever since the 1990's, when 3D gaming was still an infant, they constantly pushed the boundries of what was possible. Whether it would be a 3D shooter game, racing game, RPG game, or a strategy game, they all played well and looked good.

Carmageddon is no exception. Ever since this game came out during teh 1990's, it's been the hottest racing game ever. Not just because it's a racing game, but it's a racing with a challenge as well as having mini goals. You're not just racing to survive, but you're also racing to smack the hell out of as many pedestrians as possible. With the many kinds of odd racing out there, this one is still king (IMHO) as well as started it all.

Course, you don't have to just go through all the check points to win the race, just bash the hell out of some other racers and take them out of the race to win. The only challenge is that you don't get much time to do this, as the timer ticks down the longer you are racing.

For those who are not familiar with the game, some of the many features include...

1.) Gain time by running over people, performing cool stunts, or smacking racers just right
2.) Power ups lay all over the race which give you either land mines, extra time, or a spiked tail (Don't ask)
3.) Ability to buy vehicles and upgrades as you progress through the game
4.) Gain money by winning the race, killing all other racers, smacking peds, or performing stunts
5.) Many race tracks and 40+ (Main game + Splat pack) vehicles to choose from
6.) Complete open worlds, explore to your hearts content on each race track
7.) Peds count ranges from 200+ to 500+ per race track
8.) Race hard enough, and earn the super armoured police vehicle

And so much more. Keep in mind of course that the graphics are not up to par with todays 3D gaming, but then the game is over 20 years old.

Overall, a fun killing spree with a feel of a racing game, and with so many cars to choose from, you will want to race even harder to get those vehicles in your list. Race against other racers, slam some peds, and bash other racers out of the way. What more could you want in a racing game?

author: {'steamid': '76561198258445335', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 1498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1352, 'last_played': 1599580184}
review:
Okay. First of all, DON'T buy unless you're willing to do some patching up to get this game running smooth on modern systems. It will highly, highly unlikely not run smoothly right outta the box.

Then, the review. Good stuff:

- The gameplay. Has aged without any decay. Complete the race by wrecking all other competitors, running over all pedestrians in the level (not easy..) or drive through all the laps (there's no positions, only the checkpoints need be passed, all laps completed).
 There's complete freedom to do as you please, this really is a standout feature. The derby action is good fun. Crashes are properly satisfying. Running over pedestrians hardly gets unfun either, what with the great sounds and over-the-top gore.

- Large maps with much to explore and find, for the game's age. And if you are to complete a race by killing all the peds, you're gonna have to somehow get your way to building roofs and other not-easy-to-reach places. The maps have a wide variety of themes too. For example, a city, mine shafts, tropical island, Mayan ruins, coastal area..

Atmosphere. First, the character roster, where nobody is normal nor sane. And everyone has fittingly cool and crazy cars too, first of course, Max Damage's Eagle, then for example there's a monster truck with drill in front, Delorean with some painful-looking blades in it's front, etc..Visuals are nice when it comes to art style. The graphics haven't aged very gracefully but the art style is nice, there's a suitable amount of grit.

What sucks: 

This release. Doesn't run smoothly right outta the box. First you gotta install 95RPP, then see if it'll make the game work nice. If it doesn't try replacing the DirectDraw wrapper that comes with it by removing from game's folder the ddraw.dll and replacing it with DGVoodoo's.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972445514', 'num_games_owned': 1850, 'num_reviews': 249, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1648265487}
review:
To think this game came out in 1997 yet is still so playable and satisfying today with its solid gameplay.

CARMAGEDDON is a pure visceral thrill ride of stress venting that leaves me totally relaxed afterwards with its amazing though exaggerated physics system as one crashes into oppenant's racing cars seeing them take physical dents along with falling parts damage from the high speed impact. Its great to see touches of realism like ones engine smoking after taking a headon collision. This same smoke will obscure your vision just enough to make hitting oppenants and pedestrians a bit more difficult but in a fun non frustrating way.

Enemy ai is very well done with them giving the illusion of having their own purposes. Sometimes they'll ignore you while going against other racers and other times they'll hunt you down for many a street city block especially if you just bumped into them "accidently" :D Pedestrians will scream in terror at your approach and will start running for their stinking lives when they see you racing like a bat out of hell down the street.

Graphics are sweet in their brutality. It is quite a joy mowing down an old granny in a walker who reminds you of a certain passive aggressive senior citizen we have all had to deal with. CARMAGEDDON takes the wait out of waiting for the nursing home staff to show up to take them away as they scream in terror before you pile drive them with your race car against a building wall sending guts eyeballs and entrails flying everywhere. Ooo and what a squishy sound they make as i run over their dead bodies afterward. Then theres the sexy boys... ooo i hate sexy boys!

Sound effects are top notch from the screeching grind of cars rubbing up against a building to the POW! of crashing into public telephones and street lights. Its a real riot hearing pedestrians death screams when scoring points for killing them along with time bonuses. If one does a fancy move or stunt while killing them one is awarded even more points and or cash. Hearing your character cracking jokes or cursing really adds to the sense of immersion.

A timeless classic full of black humor and relaxing venting still absolutely playable and still gives any "modern" racing game a run for its money.

Thanks Interplay and SCi for the endless fun :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198364977428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1005, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1492685987}

author: {'steamid': '76561197977158883', 'num_games_owned': 891, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1486491952}
review:
Carmageddon fue uno de los juegos que marcó mi infancia. Un clásico de los juegos de conducción, por su violencia (algo nunca visto en un juego de coches por aquel entonces) y por su frenetismo y diversión,con carreras a velocidades de infarto y llenas de violentos choques y atropellos. Salió en el 97 y 20 años después aún lo sigo disfrutando como el primer día.

Esta versión es exactamente la misma que el clásico de PC, con lo bueno y lo malo que ello conlleva. Como positivo pues tiene todo lo que hacía bueno al original, Como negativo pienso que era bastante fácil habérselo currado mucho más como sí han hecho con la versión para móviles, que incluye mejoras gráficas y en jugabilidad, logros, etc. Podrían haberse currado un port de la versión de móviles a PC ya que lo tenían hecho, pero de todas formas se agradece la posibilidad de poder rejugar este clásico tal y como lo conocimos en su día.

Os dejo mi lista de pros y contras:

PROS:

- Uno de los juegos de conducción más míticos de todos los tiempos

- La violencia

- La sencilla jugabilidad

- Las físicas

- La sensación de velocidad

- Los míticos vehículos

- Poder acabar las carreras de tres formas: llegando el primero a la meta, matando a todos nuestros oponentes o matando a todo ser viviente del nivel

- Funciona perfectamente en ordenadores y sistemas operativos actuales (probado en Windows 10 de 64bits y en varios ordenadores actuales)

- Posibilidad de jugarlo con la aceleración 3D de 3DFX

- Incluye la música

- La policía y su brutalidad

- La variedad de vehículos

- La enorme extensión de los escenarios

- La posibilidad de mejorar el coche

- El modo replay para ver desde cualquier ángulo y en cualquier momento las repeticiones más bestias

- Tiene modo multijugador

- Las deformaciones de los vehículos

- Tiene cromos Steam


CONTRAS:

- Se podían haber currado bastante más esta edición de Steam como sí han hecho con la versión para móviles

- No tiene sistema de guardado en la nube como sí tiene la versión para móviles

- Inferior técnicamente a la versión de móviles, podían haberla porteado

- No tiene logros Steam

- muchas veces tendremos que ir a buscar a los rivales que estarán volcados por el escenario sin poder moverse

- Ganar las carreras destruyendo a los rivales es un método bastante sencillo dada su poca resistencia en comparación con la de nuestro vehículo

- Totalmente en inglés 

- Precio algo elevado para un juego tan antiguo si se compra por separado, mejor esperar a las ofertas como hice yo


CONCLUSIÓN: Su diversión, sencilla jugabilidad, las realistas deformaciones de los vehículos, la física de los coches, la conducción, la brutalidad y la violencia, la posibilidad de terminar las carreras de varias formas... hacen de él un auténtico juegazo que ya obtuvo valoraciones sobresalientes en su época hayá por el 97 y que aún a día de hoy hará disfrutar a los más nostálgicos y a los que no pudieron disfrutarlo en su día pero quieren conocer uno de esos juegos que marcó un antes y un después en la historia de los videojuegos.


Si mi análisis te ha servido de ayuda o te ha gustado, agradecería que dejaras tu valoración positiva para que pueda leerlo más gente. No dudéis en escribir abajo si tenéis cualquier tipo de duda. ¡Un saludo y gracias por leerme!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076420130', 'num_games_owned': 1224, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1655678085}
review:
Carmageddon ''MS-Dos version'' is a controversial and violent vehicular combat / car racing game, where the player must compete against a number of computer controlled opponents. Running over pedestrians and damaging opponents cars grant time bonuses and credits to be spent for upgrades.

Give me one good reason not to like this.
A classic, good old game for the hardcore gamer. 
A must have !

author: {'steamid': '76561198103192156', 'num_games_owned': 550, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1542037333}
review:
Добро пожаловать в мир крови и разрушения! В мир где дорожное полотно заляпано кровью, завалено телами и разбитыми машинами!

Игрушка вышла в конце 90-ых, но до сих пор остаётся популярной среди геймеров. На выбор у нас два водилы. Знакомьтесь, Max Damage и Die Anna! Оба сумашедшие, так как получают удовольствие от сбивания пешеходов с животными и разбивания противников! :) Макс ездит на красном Eagle, Анка же на желтом Hawk.

Видел в интернете, что кто-то пугал народ "Бойтесь! Ведь поколение, которое выросло на GTA, начало получать водительские удостоверения!". Нашли чем пугать! Поколение, которое выросло на Кармагеддоне уже давно получило эти удостоверения! :) Вернёмся к обзору.

И так, мы выбрали своего водилу. Теперь мы можем зайти в магазин запчастей и поглядеть что же нам доступно. Нам доступно по одному улучшению каждого параметра нашей тачанки (сила удара, мощность и усиление конструкции), но вот купить мы их не можем - денег нихт! :) Поэтому выбираем одну из трёх доступных для нашего рейтинга трасс и начинаем зарабатывать деньги. Пробуем проехать все круги, по дороге собираем на бампер пешеходов и соответственно пытаемся ушатать противников. Пока собирали пешеходов едва не проворонили появление ментов! В самом начале с ними лучше не тягаться в плане "кто кого затаранит до смерти", не позволяют конструкция и сила удара. А вот соперников нужно заставить потягаться. Не забываем собирать бочки с бонусами, но будте осторожны с красными бочками! Там может выпасть абсолютно любой бонус, будь-то увеличение силы удара или проклятая пружина (машина подпрыгивать будет). У меня так было однажды. Открыл карту, смотрю соперник стоит впереди меня, застрял он, ну я соответственно по газам и понёсся на него. По дороге прихватил красную бочку и вот тут началось веселье! Машина подпрыгивает, Макс орёт, я сижу нервничаю попаду или нет по сопернику. Когда до соперника остаётся всего каких-то 10 метров, машина подпрыгивает в очередной раз и мы с Максом пролетаем над застрявшим соперником (пи-и-и-ип, пи-и-и-ип пружина! пи-и-и-ип...)! Так что вот такие пирожки с котятами! :)

Каким образом тут открываются машины и улучшения параметров, я не помню (хотя проходил игрушку когда-то).

author: {'steamid': '76561197997201277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1549199022}
review:
Jak se recenzuje herní klasika ?  Těžko .
Tahle hra má po letech stále grády .  Sice to už nikdy nebude  jako vaše "poprvé" v roce 1997 , kdy jste do tlapek dostali závodní hru ve které jste pro vítězství nemuseli být zákonitě první v cíli ,ve které jsou bonusy za přejeté důchodce  a ve které šlo rozbýt vaše auto napadrť a přitom, si zachovávalo na svou dobu reálný jízdní fyzický model  .  A vemte v potaz , že tohle byla také jedna z prvních Open World her ! 
Demo jsem hrál nesčetněkrát a u kamaráda na Cyrixu MX 200 ... Hmmm to byla jízda . 

I dneska osloví především svojí původní brutalitou , dotěrností nepřátel  a stále čistou radostí z herního zážitku .
Bohužel grafika je opravdu dekády  překonaná  ale loga DOS4GW  a 3DFX by měla poznat i dnešní mládež .
Soundtrack od Fear Factory nezestárne nikdy .   

Děkuji Stainless a  SCi že na tuhle sérii nezanevřeli a všechny díly i s datadisky dali předplatitelům již ne tak dobrého Reincarnation .  Max Damage a Die Anna zůstávají ikonami ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198022690152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1501356848}
review:
I recieved this in the bundle when buying Carmageddon:Reincarnation.
This is a game I used to play as a kid (no I haven't run over anyone yet) and after all these years when it finally came out on steam and able to play on modern Windows PC's far easier than manually making it work, I got back into it.
This game for its time had some amazing physics to go with it, each crash was different, burned areas on cars wherever they caught fire, lovely exploding peds, Annoying AI which when you finally waste their ass it's damn satisfying.
If you have recently gotten into Carmageddon with the new games that have released, the original one has the smallest differences, and is definitely worth a play to see where and how this game began.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046022876', 'num_games_owned': 1157, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 555, 'last_played': 1683089418}
review:
Лучший и самый безумный на мой взгляд гоночный симулятор 90-х. Первая игра серии игр Carmageddon. Плюс этой игры в том, что гонки можно проходить по разному:
1) Скучное нарезание кругов. (Сомневаюсь, что кто-то этим будет заниматся))
2) Гоняться за соперниками и уничтожать их. Помимо обычного тарана можно сбрасывать соперников просто в воду или на мины. Имеються бонусы в виде бочек на дорогах, которые увиличат ваши шансы на уничтожение других машин. Уничтожив всех гонка считается выграной.
3) Давя пешеходов и животных. Передавив всех заезд также будет считаться выйграным. Также давя все живое вы увеличиваете время на прохождение гонки. (да, в игре есть таймер).

Нынешнее поколение врятли оценит эту игру из-за картинки. Если вы любите играеть в игры только с красивой графикой, то эта часть игры не для вас.

10 сбитых коров из 10 XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198072028556', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1664307589}
review:
Not only the bloodiest driving game ever done but also one of the best driving games of all time. Its driving and damage system was terribly advanced in its day and even now can put some AAA to shame.

Funny, bloody and entertaining, a must.

By the way, probably the dosbox emulation won't let you experience the game as well as it deserves. I would rather recommend to buy the android/ios version and play it on a tablet as it's [strike]recompiled for those specs[/strike] more enjoyable.

I got it as a gift for buying carmageddon: reincarnation

author: {'steamid': '76561197987175590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 2095, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2003, 'last_played': 1484762619}
review:
[u]What I liked about the game[/u]

•	The gameplay can be very addictive and fun, especially when you're running over pedestrians and destroying other drivers. 
•	I liked the idea that you can see the driver in the top left-hand corner, seeing his facial expressions, when something happens during the level.  
•	You have three different ways of winning each level. My favourite was destroying other drivers. 
•	I liked the arcade style of the game.
•	The vehicles in the game are awsome, You can also unlock other driver's vehicles and use them in other levels. 
•	You can upgrade your car. 

[u]What I disliked or was disappointed with[/u]

•	Can be frustrating sometimes, police can be a pain in the arse. Sometimes you don't get credits when you should. Sometimes the last driver can prove tricky to kill. 
•	The vehicles in the game can be hard to control. The vehicle brakes aren't very good and sometimes turning a corner is like turning a ship.
•	Out of the three different ways of beating the level, destroying each driver is probably the best way to beat the level, because killing a certain number of pedestrians takes too long and doing the laps isn't very rewarding.
•	The soundtrack does get repetitive and so does the gameplay, especially towards the end. 
•	It's a shame you can't visually see the upgrades you made to the car. 
•	When playing Carmageddon on dosbox, dosbox seems to flicker a lot, especially when the game is loading the main menu. When the game is loading up, I keep seeing my internet browser and a message flicker on and off.
When I double click to skip the intro sometimes I return to my internet browser and when I click back on the application to return to the game, dosbox black screens. 
	  
 
[u]Conclusion[/u] 

A fun and addictive game, which is different compared to over racing games. It can get repetitive, but I still recommend it to any retro gaming fan. 
70/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198102952287', 'num_games_owned': 291, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 6807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 788, 'last_played': 1476110611}
review:
Reincarnation пробовал... обсалютно не то! Нет уже того духа и атмосферы, как в 1 части.
1 часть - канон жанра, 2000 его искривил, а Reincarnation собиралась"Реинкорнировать" серию, но как бы не потопила её...

В Carmageddon Max Pack играешь и вспоминаешь как протирал задницу в компьютерном клубе (У нас это был компьютерный класс в соседней школе). Как ждал очередь наблюдая за игрой других в MK Trilogy, Spiderman 1, CS 1.4 (Да, да, была и такая). Эту игру я прошел еще тогда, на пеньке 2 с ламповым монитором.

Я мало пишу о самой игре потому что надо самому в неё поиграть и прочувствовать. Узнать что значит неизвестность, ведь прорисовка карты не такая уж далекая, и летя на полной скорости (С орущим и молящимся, персонажем) можно ненароком пропустить и обрыв...
Не ожидайте от игры сюжета - его там нет! Только мясо только хардкор!
10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198142611999', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1102, 'last_played': 1453615219}
review:
Ahh, Steam me dando alegrias mais uma vez. Atropelar o pedestre da bandeira sempre foi uma boa sensação.

Poder jogar Carmageddon novamente foi muito bom.
A princípio pensei que não conseguiria fazê-lo rodar no meu notebook. Mas ele já vem com o DosBox configurado para poder jogar. Basta instalar o jogo e rodar. Gostei muito.

Caso seu jogo esteja rodando com baixo FPS vá na pasta DosBox do jogo (na pasta onde o jogo foi instalado) e execute o arquivo nglide_config. Ajuste como precisar. Aqui eu coloquei o Refresh rate em 60 Hz, desativei o 3Dfx logo splash screen e desativei também o Vertical synchronization.

Pra quem jogou o jogo na época do lançamento qualquer comentário é dispensável. Mas para quem está chegando agora se prepare para um jogo sangrento.

Você pode vencer as corridas de três maneiras:
- Completando os circuitos de cada fase passando pelos checkpoints;
- Atropelando todos os pedestres das fases.
- Destruindo todos os seus oponentes.

Cada uma delas é uma diversão à parte. Mas destruir os inimigos é a mais divertida. Você pode se chocar contra eles, derrubar de pontes, empurrá-los contra bombas, etc

Mas cuidado. Eles também estão te caçando pelas pistas. E além dos carros dos outros competidores em certas fases é importante ter cuidado com os carros de polícia e uma unidade especial da polícia. Eles são mais fortes e não estão afim de te levar preso. Só o seu presunto.
[spoiler]Se quiser pegar um carro especial da polícia destrua o carro especial da polícia nas fases Blood on the Rooftops e Surreal Thing.[/spoiler]

Nas fases também existem barris com efeitos especiais. Os verdes dão dinheiro ou tempo. E os demais podem dar efeitos especiais muito bons e perigosos. Poder usar gravidade de júpiter e carro de granito foi muito bom.
E lembrar da pior maneira possível o que acontece quando pegamos um barril com modo pimbal e um buraco perto.

Como dito no fim do manual do jogo: Se você tiver pesadelos sobre pessoas estourando tente jogar dominó em vez de Carmageddon.
